16#include "Context.h"

18using namespace helios;
19
20Context::Context(){
21
22 //---- ALL DEFAULT VALUES ARE SET HERE ----//
23
24 iscontextinitialized=true;
25
26 sim_date = make_Date(1,6,2000);
27
28 sim_time = make_Time(12,0);
29
30 // --- Initialize random number generator ---- //
31
32 unsigned seed = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count();
33 generator.seed(seed);
34
35 // --- Set Geometry as `Clean' --- //
36
37 isgeometrydirty = false;
38
39 currentUUID = 0;
40
41 currentObjectID = 1; //object ID of 0 is reserved for default object
42
43}
44
45void Context::seedRandomGenerator(uint seed){
46 generator.seed(seed);
47}
48
49std::minstd_rand0* Context::getRandomGenerator(){
50 return &generator;
51}
52
53void Context::addTexture( const char* texture_file ){
54 if( textures.find(texture_file)==textures.end() ){//texture has not already been added
55 Texture text( texture_file );
56 textures[ texture_file ] = text;
57 }
58}
59
60bool Context::doesTextureFileExist(const char* texture_file ) const{
61 if (FILE *file = fopen(texture_file, "r")) {
62 fclose(file);
63 return true;
64 } else {
65 return false;
66 }
67}
68
69Texture::Texture( const char* texture_file ){
70 filename = texture_file;
71
72 //------ determine if transparency channel exists ---------//
73
74 //check if texture file has extension ".png"
75 std::string ext = getFileExtension(filename);
76 if( ext!=".png" ){
77 hastransparencychannel = false;
78 }else{
79 hastransparencychannel = PNGHasAlpha( filename.c_str() );
80 }
81
82 //-------- load transparency channel (if exists) ------------//
83
84 if( hastransparencychannel ){
85 transparencydata = readPNGAlpha( filename );
86 }
87
88 //-------- determine solid fraction --------------//
89
90 if( hastransparencychannel ){
91 size_t p = 0.f;
92 for( auto & j : transparencydata ){
93 for( bool transparency : j ){
94 if( transparency ){
95 p += 1;
96 }
97 }
98 }
99 float sf = float(p)/float(transparencydata.size()*transparencydata.front().size());
100 if( sf!=sf ){
101 sf = 0.f;
102 }
103 solidfraction = sf;
104 }else{
105 solidfraction = 1.f;
106 }
107
108
109}
110
111std::string Texture::getTextureFile() const{
112 return filename;
113}
114
115helios::int2 Texture::getSize()const {
116 return make_int2(int(transparencydata.front().size()),int(transparencydata.size()));
117}
118
119bool Texture::hasTransparencyChannel() const{
120 return hastransparencychannel;
121}
122
123const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* Texture::getTransparencyData() const{
124 return &transparencydata;
125}
126
127float Texture::getSolidFraction() const{
128 return solidfraction;
129}
130
131void Context::markGeometryClean(){
132 isgeometrydirty = false;
133}
134
135void Context::markGeometryDirty(){
136 isgeometrydirty = true;
137}

139bool Context::isGeometryDirty() const{
140 return isgeometrydirty;

159void Primitive::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] )const {
160 for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
161 T[i]=transform[i];
162 }
163}
164
165void Primitive::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
166
167 for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
168 transform[i] = T[i];
169 }
170}
171
172float Patch::getArea() const{
173
174 vec2 size = getSize();
175
176 float area = size.x*size.y*solid_fraction;
177
178 return area;
179
180}
181
182float Triangle::getArea() const{
183
184 std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
185
186 float area = calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
187 area = area*solid_fraction;
188
189 return area;
190}
191
192float Voxel::getArea() const{
193
194 vec3 size(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
195
196 float area = 2.f*size.x*size.y+2*size.x*size.z+2*size.y*size.z;
197
198 return area;
199}
200
201vec3 Patch::getNormal() const{
202
203 vec3 normal;
204
205 normal.x = transform[2];
206 normal.y = transform[6];
207 normal.z = transform[10];
208
209 normal.normalize();
210
211 return normal;
212
213}
214
215vec3 Triangle::getNormal() const{
216 std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
217 vec3 norm = cross(vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0),vertices.at(2)-vertices.at(1));
218 norm.normalize();
219 return norm;
220}
221
222vec3 Voxel::getNormal() const{
223 return make_vec3(0,0,0);
224}
225
226std::vector<vec3> Patch::getVertices() const{
227
228 vec3 Y[4];
229 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
230 vertices.resize(4);
231 Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
232 Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
233 Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
234 Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
235
236 for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
237 vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
238 vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
239 vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
240 }
241 return vertices;
242}
243
244std::vector<vec3> Triangle::getVertices() const{
245
246 vec3 Y[3];
247 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
248 vertices.resize(3);
249 Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
250 Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
251 Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
252
253 for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
254 vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
255 vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
256 vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
257 }
258 return vertices;
259
260}
261
262std::vector<vec3> Voxel::getVertices() const{
263
264 vec3 Y[8];
265 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
266 vertices.resize(8);
267 Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
268 Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
269 Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
270 Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
271 Y[4] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
272 Y[5] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
273 Y[6] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
274 Y[7] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
275
276 for( int i=0; i<8; i++ ){
277 vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
278 vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
279 vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
280 }
281 return vertices;
282}

284RGBcolor Primitive::getColor() const{

296void Primitive::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor& newcolor ){

299 // std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::setColor): Cannot set the color of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
300 // return;
301 // }
302

322 return true;

366float Primitive::getSolidFraction() const{

370void Primitive::setSolidFraction( float solidFraction ){

373
374void Patch::calculateSolidFraction( const std::map<std::string,Texture> &textures ){
375
376 if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
377 const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
378 int A = 0;
379 int At = 0;
380 int2 sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
381 int2 uv_min( std::max(0,(int)roundf(uv.at(0).x*float(sz.x))), std::max(0,(int)roundf((1.f-uv.at(2).y)*float(sz.y))) );
382 int2 uv_max( std::min(sz.x-1,(int)roundf(uv.at(2).x*float(sz.x))), std::min(sz.y-1,(int)roundf((1.f-uv.at(0).y)*float(sz.y))) );
383 for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
384 for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
385 At += 1;
386 if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
387 A += 1;
388 }
389 }
390 }
391 if( At==0 ){
392 solid_fraction = 0;
393 }else{
394 solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
395 }
396 }else{
397 solid_fraction = 1.f;
398 }
399
400}
401
402void Triangle::calculateSolidFraction( const std::map<std::string,Texture> &textures ){
403
404 if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
405 const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
406 int2 sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
407 int2 uv_min( std::max(0,(int)round(fminf(fminf(uv.at(0).x,uv.at(1).x),uv.at(2).x)*float(sz.x))), std::max(0,(int)round(fmin(fminf(uv.at(0).y,uv.at(1).y),uv.at(2).y)*float(sz.y))) );
408 int2 uv_max( std::min(sz.x-1,(int)round(fmaxf(fmaxf(uv.at(0).x,uv.at(1).x),uv.at(2).x)*float(sz.x))), std::min(sz.y-1,(int)round(fmaxf(fmaxf(uv.at(0).y,uv.at(1).y),uv.at(2).y)*float(sz.y))) );
409 int A = 0;
410 int At = 0;
411 vec2 xy;
412 for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
413 for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
414 xy.x = float(i+0.5)/float(sz.x-1);
415 xy.y = float(j+0.5)/float(sz.y-1);
416
417 bool test_0 = edgeFunction( uv.at(0), uv.at(1), xy);
418 bool test_1 = edgeFunction( uv.at(1), uv.at(2), xy );
419 bool test_2 = edgeFunction( uv.at(2), uv.at(0), xy ) ;
420 uint test_sum = test_0 + test_1 + test_2;
421
422 if(test_sum == 0 || test_sum == 3){
423 At += 1;
424 if( alpha->at(alpha->size()-j-1 ).at(i) ){
425 A += 1;
426 }
427 }
428 }
429 }
430 if( At==0 ){
431 solid_fraction = 0;
432 }else{
433 solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
434 }
435 }else{
436 solid_fraction = 1.f;
437 }
438
439}
440
441void Voxel::calculateSolidFraction( const std::map<std::string,Texture> &textures ){
442
443}
444
445bool Triangle::edgeFunction(const helios::vec2 &a, const helios::vec2 &b, const helios::vec2 &c){
446 return ((c.y - a.y) * (b.x - a.x)-(c.x - a.x) * (b.y - a.y) >= 0);
447}
448
449void Primitive::applyTransform( float (&T)[16] ){
450 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
451 std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::applyTransform): Cannot transform individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
452 return;
453 }
454
455 matmult(T,transform,transform);
456}
457
458void Primitive::scale( const vec3& S ){
459
460 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
461 std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::scale): Cannot scale individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
462 return;
463 }
464
465 float T[16];
466 makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
467 matmult(T,transform,transform);
468}
469
470void Primitive::translate( const helios::vec3& shift ){
471
472 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
473 std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::translate): Cannot translate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
474 return;
475 }
476
477 float T[16];
478 makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
479 matmult(T,transform,transform);
480}
481
482void Patch::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
483
484 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
485 std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
486 return;
487 }
488
489 if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
490 float Rz[16];
491 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
492 matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
493 }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
494 float Ry[16];
495 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
496 matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
497 }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
498 float Rx[16];
499 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
500 matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
501 }else{
502 helios_runtime_error( "ERROR (Patch::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." );
503 }
504
505}
506
507void Patch::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
508
509 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
510 std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
511 return;
512 }
513
514 float R[16];
515 makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
516 matmult(R,transform,transform);
517}
518
519void Patch::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
520
521 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
522 std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
523 return;
524 }
525
526 float R[16];
527 makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,R);
528 matmult(R,transform,transform);
529}

531void Triangle::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
532
533 if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
534 std::cout << "WARNING (Triangle::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
535 return;
536 }
537
538 if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
539 float Rz[16];
540 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
541 matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
542 }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
543 float Ry[16];
544 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
545 matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
546 }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
547 float Rx[16];
548 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
549 matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
550 }else{
551 helios_runtime_error( "ERROR (Triangle::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." );
552 }
553
554}

556void Triangle::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){

560 return;
561 }
562
563 float R[16];
564 makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
565 matmult(R,transform,transform);
566}

581

593void Voxel::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){

595}
596
597void Voxel::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
598 std::cout << "WARNING (Voxel::rotate) - Voxels can only be rotated about the z-axis. Ignoring this call to rotate()." << std::endl;
599}
600
601void Triangle::makeTransformationMatrix( const helios::vec3& vert0, const helios::vec3& vert1, const helios::vec3& vert2 ){
602
603 //We need to construct the Affine transformation matrix that transforms some generic triangle to a triangle with vertices at vertex0, vertex1, vertex2.
604
605 //V1 is going to be our generic triangle. This is the triangle that we'll intersect in the OptiX ray intersection program. We just need to pass the transformation matrix to OptiX so that we'll end up with the right triangle.
606
607 //We'll assume our generic triangle has vertices
608 //v0 = (0,0,0)
609 //v1 = (0,1,0)
610 //v2 = (1,1,0)
611 //this needs to match up with the triangle in triangle_intersect() and triangle_bounds() (see primitiveIntersection.cu).
612 //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
613
614 float V1[16];
615
616 /* [0,0] */ V1[0] = 0.f;
617 /* [0,1] */ V1[1] = 0.f;
618 /* [0,2] */ V1[2] = 1.f;
619
620 /* [1,0] */ V1[4] = 0.f;
621 /* [1,1] */ V1[5] = 1.f;
622 /* [1,2] */ V1[6] = 1.f;
623
624 /* [2,0] */ V1[8] = 0.f;
625 /* [2,1] */ V1[9] = 0.f;
626 /* [2,2] */ V1[10] = 0.f;
627
628 /* [0,3] */ V1[3] = 1.f;
629 /* [1,3] */ V1[7] = 1.f;
630 /* [2,3] */ V1[11] = 1.f;
631 /* [3,0] */ V1[12] = 1.f;
632 /* [3,1] */ V1[13] = 1.f;
633 /* [3,2] */ V1[14] = 1.f;
634 /* [3,3] */ V1[15] = 1.f;
635
636 //V2 holds the vertex locations we want to transform to
637 //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
638
639 float V2[16];
640 /* [0,0] */ V2[0] = vert0.x;
641 /* [0,1] */ V2[1] = vert1.x;
642 /* [0,2] */ V2[2] = vert2.x;
643 /* [0,3] */ V2[3] = 1.f;
644 /* [1,0] */ V2[4] = vert0.y;
645 /* [1,1] */ V2[5] = vert1.y;
646 /* [1,2] */ V2[6] = vert2.y;
647 /* [1,3] */ V2[7] = 1.f;
648 /* [2,0] */ V2[8] = vert0.z;
649 /* [2,1] */ V2[9] = vert1.z;
650 /* [2,2] */ V2[10] = vert2.z;
651 /* [2,3] */ V2[11] = 1.f;
652 /* [3,0] */ V2[12] = 1.f;
653 /* [3,1] */ V2[13] = 1.f;
654 /* [3,2] */ V2[14] = 1.f;
655 /* [3,3] */ V2[15] = 1.f;
656
657 //Now we just need to solve the linear system for our transform matrix T
658 // [T][V1] = [V2] -->
659 // [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
660
661 double inv[16], det, invV1[16];
662
663 inv[0] = V1[5] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
664 V1[5] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
665 V1[9] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
666 V1[9] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
667 V1[13] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
668 V1[13] * V1[7] * V1[10];
669
670 inv[4] = -V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
671 V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
672 V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
673 V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
674 V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
675 V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[10];
676
677 inv[8] = V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[15] -
678 V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[13] -
679 V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[15] +
680 V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[13] +
681 V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[11] -
682 V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[9];
683
684 inv[12] = -V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[14] +
685 V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[13] +
686 V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[14] -
687 V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[13] -
688 V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[10] +
689 V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[9];
690
691 inv[1] = -V1[1] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
692 V1[1] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
693 V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
694 V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
695 V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
696 V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[10];
697
698 inv[5] = V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
699 V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
700 V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
701 V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
702 V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
703 V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[10];
704
705 inv[9] = -V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[15] +
706 V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[13] +
707 V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[15] -
708 V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[13] -
709 V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[11] +
710 V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[9];
711
712 inv[13] = V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[14] -
713 V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[13] -
714 V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[14] +
715 V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[13] +
716 V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[10] -
717 V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[9];
718
719 inv[2] = V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
720 V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
721 V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
722 V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
723 V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
724 V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[6];
725
726 inv[6] = -V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
727 V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
728 V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
729 V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
730 V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
731 V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[6];
732
733 inv[10] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[15] -
734 V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[13] -
735 V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[15] +
736 V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[13] +
737 V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[7] -
738 V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[5];
739
740 inv[14] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[14] +
741 V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[13] +
742 V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[14] -
743 V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[13] -
744 V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[6] +
745 V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[5];
746
747 inv[3] = -V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
748 V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[10] +
749 V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
750 V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[10] -
751 V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
752 V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[6];
753
754 inv[7] = V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
755 V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[10] -
756 V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
757 V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[10] +
758 V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
759 V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[6];
760
761 inv[11] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[11] +
762 V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[9] +
763 V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[11] -
764 V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[9] -
765 V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[7] +
766 V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[5];
767
768 inv[15] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[10] -
769 V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[9] -
770 V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[10] +
771 V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[9] +
772 V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[6] -
773 V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[5];
774
775 det = V1[0] * inv[0] + V1[1] * inv[4] + V1[2] * inv[8] + V1[3] * inv[12];
776
777 //if (det == 0)
778 //return false;
779
780 det = 1.0 / det;
781
782 for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
783 invV1[i] = inv[i] * det;
784
785 for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
786 for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
787 transform[ j+i*4 ] = 0.f;
788 }
789 }
790
791 // Multiply to get transformation matrix [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
792 for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
793 for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
794 for(int k=0;k<4;k++){
795 transform[ j+i*4 ] += V2[k+i*4]*float(invV1[j+k*4]);
796 }
797 }
798 }
799
800}
801
802Patch::Patch( const RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
803
804 makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
805
806 color = a_color;
807 assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
808 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
809 UUID = a_UUID;
810 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
811 solid_fraction = 1.f;
812 texturefile = "";
813 texturecoloroverridden = false;
814
815}
816
817Patch::Patch( const char* a_texturefile, float a_solid_fraction, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
818
819 makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
820
821 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
822 UUID = a_UUID;
823 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
824 texturefile = a_texturefile;
825 solid_fraction = a_solid_fraction;
826 texturecoloroverridden = false;
827
828}
829
830Patch::Patch( const char* a_texturefile, const std::vector<helios::vec2>& a_uv, const std::map<std::string,Texture> &textures, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
831
832 makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
833
834 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
835 UUID = a_UUID;
836 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
837
838 texturefile = a_texturefile;
839 uv = a_uv;
840 texturecoloroverridden = false;
841
842 if( uv.size()==4 && uv.at(0).x==0 && uv.at(0).y==0 && uv.at(1).x==1 && uv.at(1).y==0 && uv.at(2).x==1 && uv.at(2).y==1 && uv.at(3).x== 0 && uv.at(3).y==1 ){
843 solid_fraction = textures.at(texturefile).getSolidFraction();
844 }else {
845 this->calculateSolidFraction(textures);
846 }
847
848}
849
850helios::vec2 Patch::getSize() const{
851 std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
852 float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
853 float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
854 return make_vec2(l,w);
855}
856
857helios::vec3 Patch::getCenter() const{
858 return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
859}
860
861Triangle::Triangle( const helios::vec3& a_vertex0, const helios::vec3& a_vertex1, const helios::vec3& a_vertex2, const helios::RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
862
863 makeTransformationMatrix(a_vertex0,a_vertex1,a_vertex2);
864 color = a_color;
865 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
866 UUID = a_UUID;
867 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
868 texturefile = "";
869 solid_fraction = 1.f;
870 texturecoloroverridden = false;
871
872}
873
874Triangle::Triangle( const helios::vec3& a_vertex0, const helios::vec3& a_vertex1, const helios::vec3& a_vertex2, const char* a_texturefile, const std::vector<helios::vec2>& a_uv, float solid_fraction, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
875
876 makeTransformationMatrix(a_vertex0,a_vertex1,a_vertex2);
877 color = make_RGBAcolor(RGB::red,1);
878 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
879 UUID = a_UUID;
880 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
881
882 texturefile = a_texturefile;
883 uv = a_uv;
884 solid_fraction = solid_fraction;
885 texturecoloroverridden = false;
886
887}
888
889Triangle::Triangle( const helios::vec3& a_vertex0, const helios::vec3& a_vertex1, const helios::vec3& a_vertex2, const char* a_texturefile, const std::vector<helios::vec2>& a_uv, const std::map<std::string,Texture> &textures, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
890
891 makeTransformationMatrix(a_vertex0,a_vertex1,a_vertex2);
892 color = make_RGBAcolor(RGB::red,1);
893 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
894 UUID = a_UUID;
895 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
896
897 texturefile = a_texturefile;
898 uv = a_uv;
899 solid_fraction = 1.f;
900 texturecoloroverridden = false;
901
902 this->calculateSolidFraction(textures);
903
904}
905
906vec3 Triangle::getVertex( int number ){
907
908 if( number<0 || number>2 ){
909 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVertex): vertex index must be 1, 2, or 3.");
910 }
911
912 vec3 Y[3];
913 Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
914 Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
915 Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
916
917 vec3 vertex;
918
919 vertex.x = transform[0] * Y[number].x + transform[1] * Y[number].y + transform[2] * Y[number].z + transform[3];
920 vertex.y = transform[4] * Y[number].x + transform[5] * Y[number].y + transform[6] * Y[number].z + transform[7];
921 vertex.z = transform[8] * Y[number].x + transform[9] * Y[number].y + transform[10] * Y[number].z + transform[11];
922
923 return vertex;
924
925}
926
927vec3 Triangle::getCenter() const{
928
929// Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
930// Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
931// Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f/3.f, 1.f, 0.f);
932
933 vec3 center0 = make_vec3(1.f/3.f,2.f/3.f,0.f);
934 vec3 center;
935
936 center.x = transform[0] * center0.x + transform[1] * center0.y + transform[2] * center0.z + transform[3];
937 center.y = transform[4] * center0.x + transform[5] * center0.y + transform[6] * center0.z + transform[7];
938 center.z = transform[8] * center0.x + transform[9] * center0.y + transform[10] * center0.z + transform[11];
939
940 return center;
941
942}
943
944Voxel::Voxel( const RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID ){
945
946 makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
947
948 color = a_color;
949 assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
950 solid_fraction = 1.f;
951 parent_object_ID = a_parent_objID;
952 UUID = a_UUID;
953 prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL;
954 texturefile = "";
955 texturecoloroverridden = false;
956
957}
958
959float Voxel::getVolume(){
960
961 vec3 size = getSize();
962
963 return size.x*size.y*size.z;
964}
965
966vec3 Voxel::getCenter() const{
967
968 vec3 center;
969 vec3 Y;
970 Y.x = 0.f;
971 Y.y = 0.f;
972 Y.z = 0.f;
973
974 center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
975 center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
976 center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
977
978 return center;
979
980}
981
982vec3 Voxel::getSize(){
983
984 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0), nz(0,0,1);
985 vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
986
987 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
988 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
989 vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
990 vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
991
992 float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
993 float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
994 float z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
995
996 return make_vec3(x,y,z);
997
998}
999
1000void Context::setDate( int day, int month, int year ){
1001
1002 if( day<1 || day>31 ){
1003 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " + std::to_string(day) + " was given).");
1004 }else if( month<1 || month>12){
1005 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " + std::to_string(month) + " was given).");
1006 }else if( year<1000 ){
1007 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.");
1008 }
1009
1010 sim_date = make_Date(day,month,year);
1011
1012}
1013
1014void Context::setDate( Date date ){
1015
1016 if( date.day<1 || date.day>31 ){
1017 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " + std::to_string(date.day) + " was given).");
1018 }else if( date.month<1 || date.month>12){
1019 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " + std::to_string(date.month) + " was given).");
1020 }else if( date.year<1000 ){
1021 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.");
1022 }
1023
1024 sim_date = date;
1025
1026}
1027
1028void Context::setDate( int Julian_day, int year ){
1029
1030 if( Julian_day<1 || Julian_day>366 ){
1031 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Julian day out of range.");
1032 }else if( year<1000 ){
1033 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.");
1034 }
1035
1036 sim_date = CalendarDay( Julian_day, year );
1037
1038}
1039
1040Date Context::getDate() const{
1041 return sim_date;
1042}
1043
1044const char* Context::getMonthString() const{
1045 if( sim_date.month==1 ){
1046 return "JAN";
1047 }else if( sim_date.month==2 ){
1048 return "FEB";
1049 }else if( sim_date.month==3 ){
1050 return "MAR";
1051 }else if( sim_date.month==4 ){
1052 return "APR";
1053 }else if( sim_date.month==5 ){
1054 return "MAY";
1055 }else if( sim_date.month==6 ){
1056 return "JUN";
1057 }else if( sim_date.month==7 ){
1058 return "JUL";
1059 }else if( sim_date.month==8 ){
1060 return "AUG";
1061 }else if( sim_date.month==9 ){
1062 return "SEP";
1063 }else if( sim_date.month==10 ){
1064 return "OCT";
1065 }else if( sim_date.month==11 ){
1066 return "NOV";
1067 }else{
1068 return "DEC";
1069 }
1070
1071}
1072
1073int Context::getJulianDate() const{
1074 return JulianDay( sim_date.day, sim_date.month, sim_date.year );
1075}
1076
1077void Context::setTime( int minute, int hour ){
1078 setTime(0,minute,hour);
1079}
1080
1081void Context::setTime( int second, int minute, int hour ){
1082
1083 if( second<0 || second>59 ){
1084 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setTime): Second out of range (0-59).");
1085 }else if( minute<0 || minute>59 ){
1086 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setTime): Minute out of range (0-59).");
1087 }else if( hour<0 || hour>23 ){
1088 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setTime): Hour out of range (0-23).");
1089 }
1090
1091 sim_time = make_Time(hour,minute,second);
1092
1093}
1094
1095void Context::setTime( Time time ){
1096
1097 if( time.minute<0 || time.minute>59 ){
1098 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setTime): Minute out of range (0-59).");
1099 }else if( time.hour<0 || time.hour>23 ){
1100 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::setTime): Hour out of range (0-23).");
1101 }
1102
1103 sim_time = time;
1104
1105}
1106
1107Time Context::getTime() const{
1108 return sim_time;
1109}
1110
1111float Context::randu(){
1112 return unif_distribution(generator);
1113}
1114
1115float Context::randu( float minrange, float maxrange ){
1116 if( maxrange<minrange ){
1117 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range.");
1118 return 0;
1119 }else if( maxrange==minrange ){
1120 return minrange;
1121 }else{
1122 return minrange+unif_distribution(generator)*(maxrange-minrange);
1123 }
1124}
1125
1126int Context::randu( int minrange, int maxrange ){
1127 if( maxrange<minrange ){
1128 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range.");
1129 return 0;
1130 }else if( maxrange==minrange ){
1131 return minrange;
1132 }else{
1133 return minrange+(int)lroundf(unif_distribution(generator)*float(maxrange-minrange));
1134 }
1135}
1136
1137float Context::randn(){
1138 return norm_distribution(generator);
1139}
1140
1141float Context::randn( float mean, float stddev ){
1142 return mean+norm_distribution(generator)*fabsf(stddev);
1143}
1144
1145uint Context::addPatch(){
1146 return addPatch(make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec2(1,1),make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
1147}
1148
1149uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
1150 return addPatch(center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
1151}
1152
1153uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
1154 return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
1155}
1156
1157uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
1158 return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
1159}
1160
1161uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
1162
1163 if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
1164 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0.");
1165 }
1166
1167 auto* patch_new = (new Patch( color, 0, currentUUID ));
1168
1169// if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
1170// helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.");
1171// }
1172
1173 patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
1174
1175 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
1176 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
1177 }
1178 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
1179 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
1180 }
1181
1182 patch_new->translate( center );
1183
1184 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
1185 markGeometryDirty();
1186 currentUUID++;
1187 return currentUUID-1;
1188}
1189
1190uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
1191
1192 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
1193 std::string fn = texture_file;
1194 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
1195 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
1196 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
1197 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texture_file) ){
1198 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Texture file " + std::string(texture_file) + " does not exist.");
1199 }
1200
1201 addTexture( texture_file );
1202
1203 auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file, textures.at(texture_file).getSolidFraction(), 0, currentUUID ));
1204
1205// if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
1206// helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.");
1207// }
1208
1209 assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
1210 patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
1211
1212 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
1213 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
1214 }
1215 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
1216 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
1217 }
1218
1219 patch_new->translate( center );
1220
1221 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
1222 markGeometryDirty();
1223 currentUUID++;
1224 return currentUUID-1;
1225}
1226
1227uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv_center, const helios::vec2& uv_size ){
1228
1229 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
1230 std::string fn = texture_file;
1231 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
1232 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
1233 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
1234 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texture_file) ){
1235 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Texture file " + std::string(texture_file) + " does not exist.");
1236 }
1237
1238 if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
1239 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0.");
1240 }
1241
1242 if( uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x<-1e-3 || uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y<-1e-3 || uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x-1.f>1e-3 || uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y-1.f>1e-3 ){
1243 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Invalid texture coordinates. uv_center-0.5*uv_size should be >=0 and uv_center+0.5*uv_size should be <=1.");
1244 }
1245
1246 addTexture( texture_file );
1247
1248 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
1249 uv.resize(4);
1250 uv.at(0) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5f*uv_size.x,-0.5f*uv_size.y);
1251 uv.at(1) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5f*uv_size.x,-0.5f*uv_size.y);
1252 uv.at(2) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5f*uv_size.x,+0.5f*uv_size.y);
1253 uv.at(3) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5f*uv_size.x,+0.5f*uv_size.y);
1254
1255 auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file, uv, textures, 0, currentUUID ));
1256
1257// if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
1258// helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.");
1259// }
1260
1261 assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
1262 patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
1263
1264 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
1265 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
1266 }
1267 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
1268 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
1269 }
1270
1271 patch_new->translate( center );
1272
1273 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
1274 markGeometryDirty();
1275 currentUUID++;
1276 return currentUUID-1;
1277}
1278
1279uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2 ){
1280 return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1) );
1281}
1282
1283uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBcolor& color ){
1284 return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(color,1) );
1285}
1286
1287uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBAcolor& color ){
1288
1289 auto* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, color, 0, currentUUID ));
1290
1291// if( tri_new->getArea()==0 ){
1292// helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Triangle has area of zero.");
1293// }
1294
1295 primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
1296 markGeometryDirty();
1297 currentUUID++;
1298 return currentUUID-1;
1299}
1300
1301uint Context::addTriangle( const helios::vec3& vertex0, const helios::vec3& vertex1, const helios::vec3& vertex2, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv0, const helios::vec2& uv1, const helios::vec2& uv2 ){
1302
1303 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
1304 std::string fn = texture_file;
1305 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
1306 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
1307 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
1308 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texture_file) ){
1309 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Texture file " + std::string(texture_file) + " does not exist.");
1310 }
1311
1312 addTexture( texture_file );
1313
1314 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
1315 uv.resize(3);
1316 uv.at(0) = uv0;
1317 uv.at(1) = uv1;
1318 uv.at(2) = uv2;
1319
1320 auto* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, texture_file, uv, textures, 0, currentUUID ));
1321
1322// if( tri_new->getArea()==0 ){
1323// helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Triangle has area of zero.");
1324// }
1325
1326 primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
1327 markGeometryDirty();
1328 currentUUID++;
1329 return currentUUID-1;
1330}
1331
1332uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size ){
1333 return addVoxel(center,size,0,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
1334}
1335
1336uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation ){
1337 return addVoxel(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
1338}
1339
1340uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
1341 return addVoxel(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
1342}
1343
1344uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
1345
1346 auto* voxel_new = (new Voxel( color, 0, currentUUID ));
1347
1348 if( size.x*size.y*size.z==0 ){
1349 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addVoxel): Voxel has size of zero.");
1350 }
1351
1352 voxel_new->scale( size );
1353
1354 if( rotation!=0 ){
1355 voxel_new->rotate( rotation, "z" );
1356 }
1357
1358 voxel_new->translate( center );
1359
1360 primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
1361 markGeometryDirty();
1362 currentUUID++;
1363 return currentUUID-1;
1364}
1365
1366void Context::translatePrimitive(uint UUID, const vec3& shift ){
1367 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->translate(shift);
1368}
1369
1370void Context::translatePrimitive( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, const vec3& shift ){
1371
1372 float T[16];
1373 makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
1374
1375 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1376 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->applyTransform(T);
1377 }
1378}
1379
1380void Context::rotatePrimitive(uint UUID, float rot, const char* axis ){
1381 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->rotate(rot,axis);
1382}
1383
1384void Context::rotatePrimitive( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, float rot, const char* axis ){
1385
1386 float T[16];
1387 if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
1388 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",T);
1389 }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
1390 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",T);
1391 }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
1392 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",T);
1393 }else{
1394 helios_runtime_error( "ERROR (Context::rotatePrimitive): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." );
1395 }
1396
1397 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1398 if( strcmp(axis,"z")!=0 && getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1399 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::rotatePrimitive): Voxels can only be rotate about the z-axis. Ignoring this rotation." << std::endl;
1400 }
1401 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->applyTransform(T);
1402 }
1403}
1404
1405void Context::rotatePrimitive(uint UUID, float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
1406 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->rotate(rot,axis);
1407}
1408
1409void Context::rotatePrimitive(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, float rot, const vec3 &axis ){
1410
1411 float T[16];
1412 makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,T);
1413
1414 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1415 if( getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1416 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::rotatePrimitive): Voxels can only be rotate about the z-axis. Ignoring this rotation." << std::endl;
1417 }
1418 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->applyTransform(T);
1419 }
1420}
1421
1422void Context::rotatePrimitive( uint UUID, float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
1423 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
1424}
1425
1426void Context::rotatePrimitive(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const vec3 &axis ){
1427
1428 float T[16];
1429 makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,T);
1430
1431 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1432 if( getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1433 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::rotatePrimitive): Voxels can only be rotate about the z-axis. Ignoring this rotation." << std::endl;
1434 }
1435 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->applyTransform(T);
1436 }
1437}
1438
1439void Context::scalePrimitive(uint UUID, const helios::vec3& S ){
1440 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->scale(S);
1441}
1442
1443void Context::scalePrimitive( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, const helios::vec3& S ){
1444
1445 float T[16];
1446 makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
1447
1448 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1449 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->applyTransform(T);
1450 }
1451}
1452
1453void Context::deletePrimitive( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs ){
1454 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1455 deletePrimitive( UUID );
1456 }
1457}
1458
1459void Context::deletePrimitive(uint UUID ){
1460
1461 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1462 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::deletePrimitive): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " not found in the context.");
1463 }
1464
1465 Primitive* prim = primitives.at(UUID);
1466
1467 if( prim->getParentObjectID()!=0 ){//primitive belongs to an object
1468
1469 uint ObjID = prim->getParentObjectID();
1470 if( doesObjectExist(ObjID) ) {
1471 objects.at(ObjID)->deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
1472 if(getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().empty() )
1473 {
1474 CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(ObjID);
1475 delete obj;
1476 objects.erase(ObjID);
1477 }
1478 }
1479 }
1480
1481 delete prim;
1482 primitives.erase(UUID);
1483
1484 markGeometryDirty();
1485
1486
1487}
1488std::vector<uint> Context::copyPrimitive(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
1489
1490 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy(UUIDs.size());
1491 size_t i=0;
1492 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1493 UUIDs_copy.at(i) = copyPrimitive( UUID );
1494 i++;
1495 }
1496
1497 return UUIDs_copy;
1498
1499}
1500
1501uint Context::copyPrimitive( uint UUID ){
1502
1503 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1504 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::copyPrimitive): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " not found in the context.");
1505 }
1506
1507 PrimitiveType type = primitives.at(UUID)->getType();
1508 uint parentID = primitives.at(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
1509 bool textureoverride = primitives.at(UUID)->isTextureColorOverridden();
1510
1511 if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
1512 Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(UUID);
1513 std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
1514 vec2 size = p->getSize();
1515 float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/(size.x*size.y);
1516 Patch* patch_new;
1517 if( !p->hasTexture() ){
1518 patch_new = (new Patch( p->getColorRGBA(), parentID, currentUUID ));
1519 }else{
1520 std::string texture_file = p->getTextureFile();
1521 if( uv.size()==4 ){
1522 patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file.c_str(), solid_fraction, parentID, currentUUID ));
1523 patch_new->setTextureUV(uv);
1524 }else{
1525 patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file.c_str(), solid_fraction, parentID, currentUUID ));
1526 }
1527 }
1528 float transform[16];
1529 p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
1530 patch_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
1531 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
1532 }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
1533 Triangle* p = getTrianglePointer_private(UUID);
1534 std::vector<vec3> vertices = p->getVertices();
1535 std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
1536 Triangle* tri_new;
1537 if( !p->hasTexture() ){
1538 tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), p->getColorRGBA(), parentID, currentUUID ));
1539 }else{
1540 std::string texture_file = p->getTextureFile();
1541 float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
1542 tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv, solid_fraction, parentID, currentUUID ));
1543 tri_new->setSolidFraction(solid_fraction);
1544 }
1545 float transform[16];
1546 p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
1547 tri_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
1548 primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
1549 }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1550 Voxel* p = getVoxelPointer_private(UUID);
1551 Voxel* voxel_new;
1552 //if( !p->hasTexture() ){
1553 voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), parentID, currentUUID ));
1554 //}else{
1555 // voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
1556 /* \todo Texture-mapped voxels constructor here */
1557 //}
1558 float transform[16];
1559 p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
1560 voxel_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
1561 primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
1562 }
1563
1564 copyPrimitiveData( UUID, currentUUID );
1565
1566 if( textureoverride ){
1567 getPrimitivePointer_private(currentUUID)->overrideTextureColor();
1568 }
1569
1570 markGeometryDirty();
1571 currentUUID++;
1572 return currentUUID-1;
1573}
1574
1575Primitive* Context::getPrimitivePointer_private( uint UUID ) const{
1576 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1577 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPrimitivePointer_private): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1578 }
1579 return primitives.at(UUID);
1580}
1581
1582bool Context::doesPrimitiveExist(uint UUID ) const{
1583 return primitives.find(UUID) != primitives.end();
1584}
1585
1586bool Context::doesPrimitiveExist( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ) const{
1587 if( UUIDs.empty() ){
1588 return false;
1589 }
1590 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
1591 if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
1592 return false;
1593 }
1594 }
1595 return true;
1596}
1597
1598Patch* Context::getPatchPointer_private(uint UUID ) const{
1599 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1600 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchPointer_private): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1601 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
1602 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchPointer_private): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.");
1603 }
1604 return dynamic_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID));
1605}
1606
1607helios::vec2 Context::getPatchSize( uint UUID ) const{
1608 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1609 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchSize): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1610 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
1611 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchSize): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.");
1612 }
1613 return dynamic_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getSize();
1614}
1615
1616helios::vec3 Context::getPatchCenter( uint UUID ) const{
1617 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1618 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchCenter): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1619 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
1620 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPatchCenter): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.");
1621 }
1622 return dynamic_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getCenter();
1623}
1624
1625Triangle* Context::getTrianglePointer_private(uint UUID ) const{
1626 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1627 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTrianglePointer_private): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1628 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
1629 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTrianglePointer_private): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a triangle.");
1630 }
1631 return dynamic_cast<Triangle*>(primitives.at(UUID));
1632}
1633
1634helios::vec3 Context::getTriangleVertex( uint UUID, uint number ) const{
1635 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1636 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTriangleVertex): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1637 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
1638 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTriangleVertex): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a triangle.");
1639 }else if( number>2 ){
1640 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTriangleVertex): Vertex index must be one of 0, 1, or 2.");
1641 }
1642 return dynamic_cast<Triangle*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getVertex( number );
1643}
1644
1645Voxel* Context::getVoxelPointer_private(uint UUID ) const{
1646 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1647 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1648 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1649 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a voxel.");
1650 }
1651 return dynamic_cast<Voxel*>(primitives.at(UUID));
1652}
1653
1654helios::vec3 Context::getVoxelSize( uint UUID ) const{
1655 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1656 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelSize): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1657 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1658 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelSize): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.");
1659 }
1660 return dynamic_cast<Voxel*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getSize();
1661}
1662
1663helios::vec3 Context::getVoxelCenter( uint UUID ) const{
1664 if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1665 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelCenter): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
1666 }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
1667 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getVoxelCenter): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.");
1668 }
1669 return dynamic_cast<Voxel*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getCenter();
1670}
1671
1672uint Context::getPrimitiveCount() const{
1673 return primitives.size();
1674}
1675
1676std::vector<uint> Context::getAllUUIDs() const{
1677 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
1678 UUIDs.resize(primitives.size());
1679 size_t i=0;
1680 for( auto primitive : primitives){
1681 UUIDs.at(i) = primitive.first;
1682 i++;
1683 }
1684 return UUIDs;
1685}
1686
1687void Context::addTimeseriesData(const char* label, float value, const Date &date, const Time &time ){
1688
1689 //floating point value corresponding to date and time
1690 double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
1691 date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
1692
1693 //Check if data label already exists
1694 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1695 timeseries_data[label].push_back( value );
1696 timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value );
1697 return;
1698 }else{ //exists
1699
1700 uint N = getTimeseriesLength(label);
1701
1702 auto it_data = timeseries_data[label].begin();
1703 auto it_datevalue = timeseries_datevalue[label].begin();
1704
1705 if( N==1 ){
1706
1707 if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){
1708 timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
1709 timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
1710 return;
1711 }else{
1712 timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+1, value);
1713 timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+1, date_value);
1714 return;
1715 }
1716
1717 }else{
1718
1719 if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){ //check if data should be inserted at beginning of timeseries
1720 timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
1721 timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
1722 return;
1723 }else if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].back() ){ //check if data should be inserted at end of timeseries
1724 timeseries_data[label].push_back( value);
1725 timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value);
1726 return;
1727 }
1728
1729 //data should be inserted somewhere in the middle of timeseries
1730 for( uint t=0; t<N-1; t++ ){
1731 if( date_value==timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) ){
1732 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::addTimeseriesData): Skipping duplicate timeseries date/time." << std::endl;
1733 continue;
1734 }
1735 if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) && date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t+1) ){
1736 timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+t+1, value);
1737 timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+t+1, date_value);
1738 return;
1739 }
1740 }
1741
1742 }
1743
1744 }
1745
1746 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTimeseriesData): Failed to insert timeseries data for unknown reason.");
1747
1748}
1749
1750void Context::setCurrentTimeseriesPoint(const char* label, uint index ){
1751 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1752 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesPoint): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.");
1753 }
1754 setDate( queryTimeseriesDate( label, index ) );
1755 setTime( queryTimeseriesTime( label, index ) );
1756}
1757
1758float Context::queryTimeseriesData(const char* label, const Date &date, const Time &time ) const{
1759 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1760 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.");
1761 }
1762
1763 double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
1764 date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
1765
1766 double tmin = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).front();
1767 double tmax = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).back();
1768
1769 if( date_value<tmin ){
1770 std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the earliest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
1771 return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
1772 }else if( date_value>tmax ){
1773 std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the latest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
1774 return timeseries_data.at(label).back();
1775 }
1776
1777 if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).empty() ){
1778 std::cout << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): timeseries " << label << " does not contain any data." << std::endl;
1779 return 0;
1780 }else if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 1 ){
1781 return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
1782 }else{
1783 int i;
1784 bool success=false;
1785 for( i=0; i<timeseries_data.at(label).size()-1; i++ ){
1786 if( date_value>=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i) && date_value<=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1) ){
1787 success = true;
1788 break;
1789 }
1790 }
1791
1792 if(!success){
1793 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (queryTimeseriesData): Failed to query timeseries data for unknown reason.");
1794 }
1795
1796 double xminus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i);
1797 double xplus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i+1);
1798
1799 double tminus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i);
1800 double tplus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1);
1801
1802 return float(xminus + (xplus-xminus)*(date_value-tminus)/(tplus-tminus));
1803
1804 }
1805
1806}
1807
1808float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
1809
1810 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1811 helios_runtime_error("ERROR( Context::getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable " + std::string(label) + " does not exist.");
1812 }
1813
1814 return timeseries_data.at(label).at(index);
1815
1816}
1817
1818Time Context::queryTimeseriesTime( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
1819
1820 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1821 helios_runtime_error("ERROR( Context::getTimeseriesTime): Timeseries variable " + std::string(label) + " does not exist.");
1822 }
1823
1824 double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
1825
1826 int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
1827 assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
1828
1829 int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
1830 assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
1831
1832 int hour = floor((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.);
1833 int minute = floor( ((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.-double(hour))*60. );
1834 int second = (int)lround( ( ( ( dateval - floor(dateval) )*24. - double(hour))*60. - double(minute) )*60.);
1835
1836 if( second==60 ){
1837 second = 0;
1838 minute ++;
1839 }
1840
1841 if( minute==60 ){
1842 minute = 0;
1843 hour ++;
1844 }
1845
1846 assert( second>=0 && second<60 );
1847 assert( minute>=0 && minute<60 );
1848 assert( hour>=0 && hour<24 );
1849
1850 return make_Time(hour,minute,second);
1851
1852}
1853
1854Date Context::queryTimeseriesDate( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
1855
1856 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1857 helios_runtime_error("ERROR( Context::getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable " + std::string(label) + " does not exist.");
1858 }
1859
1860 double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
1861
1862 int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
1863 assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
1864
1865 int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
1866 assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
1867
1868 Date date = Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
1869
1870 return Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
1871
1872}
1873
1874uint Context::getTimeseriesLength( const char* label ) const{
1875
1876 uint size = 0;
1877 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
1878 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.");
1879 }else{
1880 size = timeseries_data.at(label).size();
1881 }
1882
1883 return size;
1884}
1885
1886bool Context::doesTimeseriesVariableExist( const char* label ) const{
1887
1888 if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ) { //does not exist
1889 return false;
1890 }else{
1891 return true;
1892 }
1893
1894}
1895
1896void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
1897
1898 xbounds.x = 1e8;
1899 xbounds.y = -1e8;
1900 ybounds.x = 1e8;
1901 ybounds.y = -1e8;
1902 zbounds.x = 1e8;
1903 zbounds.y = -1e8;
1904
1905 for( auto primitive : primitives){
1906
1907 std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first)->getVertices();
1908
1909 for( auto & vert : verts){
1910 if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
1911 xbounds.x = vert.x;
1912 }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
1913 xbounds.y = vert.x;
1914 }
1915 if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
1916 ybounds.x = vert.y;
1917 }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
1918 ybounds.y = vert.y;
1919 }
1920 if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
1921 zbounds.x = vert.z;
1922 }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
1923 zbounds.y = vert.z;
1924 }
1925 }
1926
1927 }
1928
1929}
1930
1931void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
1932
1933 xbounds.x = 1e8;
1934 xbounds.y = -1e8;
1935 ybounds.x = 1e8;
1936 ybounds.y = -1e8;
1937 zbounds.x = 1e8;
1938 zbounds.y = -1e8;
1939
1940 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
1941
1942 std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID )->getVertices();
1943
1944 for( auto & vert : verts){
1945 if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
1946 xbounds.x = vert.x;
1947 }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
1948 xbounds.y = vert.x;
1949 }
1950 if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
1951 ybounds.x = vert.y;
1952 }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
1953 ybounds.y = vert.y;
1954 }
1955 if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
1956 zbounds.x = vert.z;
1957 }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
1958 zbounds.y = vert.z;
1959 }
1960 }
1961
1962 }
1963
1964}
1965
1966void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
1967
1968 vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
1969 getDomainBoundingBox( xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
1970
1971 center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
1972 center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
1973 center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
1974
1975 radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
1976
1977
1978}
1979
1980void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
1981
1982 vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
1983 getDomainBoundingBox( UUIDs, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
1984
1985 center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
1986 center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
1987 center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
1988
1989 radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
1990
1991
1992}
1993
1994void Context::cropDomainX(const vec2 &xbounds ){
1995
1996 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
1997
1998 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
1999
2000 for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
2001
2002 vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
2003
2004 for(auto & vertex : vertices){
2005 if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y ){
2006 deletePrimitive(p);
2007 break;
2008 }
2009 }
2010
2011 }
2012
2013 if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
2014 std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainX): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
2015 }
2016
2017}
2018
2019void Context::cropDomainY(const vec2 &ybounds ){
2020
2021 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
2022
2023 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
2024
2025 for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
2026
2027 vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
2028
2029 for(auto & vertex : vertices){
2030 if( vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y ){
2031 deletePrimitive(p);
2032 break;
2033 }
2034 }
2035
2036 }
2037
2038 if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
2039 std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainY): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
2040 }
2041
2042}
2043
2044void Context::cropDomainZ(const vec2 &zbounds ){
2045
2046 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
2047
2048 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
2049
2050 for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
2051
2052 vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
2053
2054 for(auto & vertex : vertices){
2055 if( vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
2056 deletePrimitive(p);
2057 break;
2058 }
2059 }
2060
2061 }
2062
2063 if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
2064 std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainZ): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
2065 }
2066
2067}
2068
2069void Context::cropDomain(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
2070
2071 std::vector<vec3> vertices;
2072
2073 size_t delete_count = 0;
2074 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2075
2076 vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getVertices();
2077
2078 for(auto & vertex : vertices){
2079 if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y || vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y || vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
2080 deletePrimitive(UUID);
2081 delete_count++;
2082 break;
2083 }
2084 }
2085
2086 }
2087
2088 if( delete_count==UUIDs.size() ){
2089 std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomain): No specified primitives were entirely inside cropped area, and thus all specified primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
2090 }
2091
2092}
2093
2094void Context::cropDomain(const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
2095 cropDomain( getAllUUIDs(), xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
2096}
2097
2098uint CompoundObject::getObjectID() const{
2099 return OID;
2100}

2102helios::ObjectType CompoundObject::getObjectType() const{
2103 return type;
2104}
2105
2106uint CompoundObject::getPrimitiveCount() const{
2107 return UUIDs.size();
2108}
2109
2110
2111std::vector<uint> CompoundObject::getPrimitiveUUIDs() const{
2112
2113 return UUIDs;
2114
2115}
2116
2117bool CompoundObject::doesObjectContainPrimitive(uint UUID ){
2118
2119 return find(UUIDs.begin(),UUIDs.end(),UUID)!=UUIDs.end();
2120
2121}
2122
2123helios::vec3 CompoundObject::getObjectCenter() const{
2124
2125 vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
2126
2127 std::vector<uint> U = getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2128
2129 context->getDomainBoundingBox( U, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
2130
2131 vec3 origin;
2132
2133 origin.x = 0.5f*(xbounds.x+xbounds.y);
2134 origin.y = 0.5f*(ybounds.x+ybounds.y);
2135 origin.z = 0.5f*(zbounds.x+zbounds.y);
2136
2137 return origin;
2138}
2139
2140float CompoundObject::getArea() const{
2141
2142 float area = 0.f;
2143
2144 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2145
2146 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2147 area += context->getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
2148 }
2149
2150 }
2151
2152 return area;
2153
2154}
2155

2157 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2158
2159 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2160 context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
2161 }
2162
2163 }
2164}

2170 context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
2171 }
2172
2173 }
2174}

2193 }
