2195
2196bool CompoundObject::hasTexture() const{
2197 if( getTextureFile().empty() ){
2198 return false;
2199 }else{
2200 return true;
2201 }
2202}
2203
2204std::string CompoundObject::getTextureFile() const{
2205 return texturefile;
2206}
2207
2208void CompoundObject::translate( const helios::vec3& shift ){
2209
2210 float T[16], T_prim[16];
2211 makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
2212
2213 matmult(T,transform,transform);
2214
2215 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2216
2217 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2218
2219 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
2220 matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
2221 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
2222 }
2223
2224 }
2225
2226}
2227
2228void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
2229
2230 if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
2231 float Rz[16], Rz_prim[16];
2232 makeRotationMatrix(-rot,"z",Rz);
2233 matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
2234
2235 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2236 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2237 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
2238 matmult(Rz,Rz_prim,Rz_prim);
2239 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
2240 }
2241 }
2242 }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
2243 float Ry[16], Ry_prim[16];
2244 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
2245 matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
2246 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2247 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2248 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
2249 matmult(Ry,Ry_prim,Ry_prim);
2250 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
2251 }
2252 }
2253 }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
2254 float Rx[16], Rx_prim[16];
2255 makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
2256 matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
2257 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2258 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2259 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
2260 matmult(Rx,Rx_prim,Rx_prim);
2261 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
2262 }
2263 }
2264 }else{
2265 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (CompoundObject::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z.");
2266 }
2267
2268}
2269
2270void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
2271
2272 float R[16], R_prim[16];
2273 makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
2274 matmult(R,transform,transform);
2275
2276 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2277
2278 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2279
2280 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
2281 matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
2282 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
2283
2284 }
2285
2286 }
2287
2288}
2289
2290void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
2291
2292 float R[16], R_prim[16];
2293 makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,R);
2294 matmult(R,transform,transform);
2295
2296 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
2297
2298 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
2299
2300 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
2301 matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
2302 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
2303
2304 }
2305
2306 }
2307
2308}
2309
2310void CompoundObject::scale( const helios::vec3 &scale ){
2311
2312 float T[16], T_prim[16];
2313 makeScaleMatrix( scale, T);
2314 matmult(T,transform,transform);
2315
2316 for( uint UUID : UUIDs) {
2317
2318 if (context->doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
2319
2320 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
2321 matmult(T, T_prim, T_prim);
2322 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
2323
2324 }
2325
2326 }
2327}
2328
2329void CompoundObject::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ) const{
2330 for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
2331 T[i]=transform[i];
2332 }
2333}
2334
2335void CompoundObject::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
2336
2337 for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
2338 transform[i] = T[i];
2339 }
2340
2341}
2342
2343void CompoundObject::setPrimitiveUUIDs( const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs ){
2344 UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
2345}
2346
2347void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( uint UUID ){
2348 auto it = find( UUIDs.begin(), UUIDs.end(), UUID );
2349 if( it!=UUIDs.end() ){
2350 std::iter_swap(it,UUIDs.end()-1);
2351 UUIDs.pop_back();
2352 primitivesarecomplete=false;
2353 }
2354}
2355
2356void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs ){
2357 for( uint UUID : a_UUIDs ){
2358 deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
2359 }
2360}
2361
2362bool CompoundObject::arePrimitivesComplete() const{
2363 return primitivesarecomplete;
2364}
2365
2366bool Context::areObjectPrimitivesComplete( uint objID ) const{
2367 return getObjectPointer(objID)->arePrimitivesComplete();
2368}
2369
2370CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer( uint ObjID ) const{
2371 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
2372 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
2373 }
2374 return objects.at(ObjID);
2375}
2376
2377uint Context::getObjectCount() const{
2378 return objects.size();
2379}
2380
2381bool Context::doesObjectExist( const uint ObjID ) const{
2382 return objects.find(ObjID) != objects.end();
2383}
2384
2385std::vector<uint> Context::getAllObjectIDs() const{
2386 std::vector<uint> objIDs;
2387 objIDs.resize(objects.size());
2388 size_t i=0;
2389 for(auto object : objects){
2390 objIDs.at(i) = object.first;
2391 i++;
2392 }
2393 return objIDs;
2394}
2395
2396void Context::deleteObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
2397 for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
2398 deleteObject( ObjID );
2399 }
2400}
2401
2402void Context::deleteObject(uint ObjID ){
2403
2404 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
2405 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (deleteObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context.");
2406 }
2407
2408 CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(ObjID);
2409
2410 std::vector<uint> UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2411
2412
2413 delete obj;
2414 objects.erase(ObjID);
2415
2416 deletePrimitive(UUIDs);
2417
2418 markGeometryDirty();
2419
2420}
2421
2422std::vector<uint> Context::copyObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
2423
2424 std::vector<uint> ObjIDs_copy(ObjIDs.size());
2425 size_t i=0;
2426 for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
2427 ObjIDs_copy.at(i) = copyObject( ObjID );
2428 i++;
2429 }
2430
2431 return ObjIDs_copy;
2432
2433}
2434
2435uint Context::copyObject(uint ObjID ){
2436
2437 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
2438 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (copyObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context.");
2439 }
2440
2441 ObjectType type = objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType();
2442
2443 std::vector<uint> UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2444
2445 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy = copyPrimitive( UUIDs );
2446 for( uint p : UUIDs_copy){
2447 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID( currentObjectID );
2448 }
2449
2450 std::string texturefile = objects.at(ObjID)->getTextureFile();
2451
2452 if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
2453
2454 Tile* o = getTileObjectPointer( ObjID );
2455
2456 int2 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2457
2458 auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2459
2460 objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
2461
2462 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
2463
2464 Sphere* o = getSphereObjectPointer( ObjID );
2465
2466 uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2467
2468 auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2469
2470 objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
2471
2472 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
2473
2474 Tube* o = getTubeObjectPointer( ObjID );
2475
2476 std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
2477 std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
2478 std::vector<RGBcolor> colors = o->getNodeColors();
2479 uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2480
2481 auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes, radius, colors, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2482
2483 objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
2484
2485 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
2486
2487 Box* o = getBoxObjectPointer( ObjID );
2488
2489 vec3 size = o->getSize();
2490 int3 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2491
2492 auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2493
2494 objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
2495
2496 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
2497
2498 Disk* o = getDiskObjectPointer( ObjID );
2499
2500 vec2 size = o->getSize();
2501 int2 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2502
2503 auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2504
2505 objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
2506
2507 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
2508
2509 Polymesh* o = getPolymeshObjectPointer( ObjID );
2510
2511 auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2512
2513 objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
2514
2515 }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ){
2516
2517 Cone* o = getConeObjectPointer( ObjID );
2518
2519 std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodeCoordinates();
2520 std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
2521 uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
2522
2523 auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radius.at(0), radius.at(1),
2524 subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
2525
2526 objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
2527
2528 }
2529
2530 copyObjectData( ObjID, currentObjectID );
2531
2532 float T[16];
2533 getObjectPointer( ObjID )->getTransformationMatrix( T );
2534
2535 getObjectPointer( currentObjectID )->setTransformationMatrix( T );
2536
2537
2538 markGeometryDirty();
2539 currentObjectID++;
2540 return currentObjectID-1;
2541}
2542
2543std::vector<uint> Context::filterObjectsByData( const std::vector<uint> &IDs, const char* object_data, float threshold, const char* comparator) const{
2544
2545 std::vector<uint> output_object_IDs;
2546 output_object_IDs.resize(IDs.size());
2547 uint passed_count=0;
2548
2549 for(uint i=0;i<IDs.size();i++)
2550 {
2551
2552 if( doesObjectDataExist(IDs.at(i), object_data) ){
2553
2554 HeliosDataType type = getObjectDataType(IDs.at(i), object_data);
2555 if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2556 uint R;
2557 getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
2558 if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
2559 if( float(R)<threshold ){
2560 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2561 passed_count++;
2562 }
2563 }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
2564 if( float(R)>threshold ){
2565 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2566 passed_count++;
2567 }
2568 }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
2569 if( float(R)==threshold ){
2570 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2571 passed_count++;
2572 }
2573 }
2574
2575 }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT){
2576 float R;
2577 getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
2578
2579 if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
2580 if( R<threshold ){
2581 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2582 passed_count++;
2583 }
2584 }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
2585 if( R>threshold ){
2586 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2587 passed_count++;
2588 }
2589 }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
2590 if( R==threshold ){
2591 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2592 passed_count++;
2593 }
2594 }
2595
2596 }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT){
2597 int R;
2598 getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
2599
2600 if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
2601 if( float(R)<threshold ){
2602 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2603 passed_count++;
2604 }
2605 }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
2606 if( float(R)>threshold ){
2607 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2608 passed_count++;
2609 }
2610 }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
2611 if( float(R)==threshold ){
2612 output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
2613 passed_count++;
2614 }
2615 }
2616 }else{
2617 std::cout << "WARNING: Object data not of type UINT, INT, or FLOAT. Filtering for other types not yet supported." << std::endl;
2618 }
2619
2620
2621 }
2622 }
2623
2624 output_object_IDs.resize(passed_count);
2625
2626 return output_object_IDs;
2627
2628}
2629
2630void Context::translateObject(uint ObjID, const vec3& shift ){
2631 getObjectPointer(ObjID)->translate(shift);
2632}
2633
2634void Context::translateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, const vec3& shift ){
2635 for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
2636 getObjectPointer(ID)->translate(shift);
2637 }
2638}
2639
2640void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const char* axis ){
2641 getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
2642}
2643
2644void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const char* axis ){
2645 for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
2646 getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
2647 }
2648}
2649
2650void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
2651 getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
2652}
2653
2654void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
2655 for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
2656 getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
2657 }
2658}
2659
2660void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
2661 getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
2662}
2663
2664void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
2665 for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
2666 getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
2667 }
2668}
2669
2670void Context::scaleObject( uint ObjID, const helios::vec3 &scalefact ){
2671 getObjectPointer(ObjID)->scale(scalefact);
2672}
2673
2674void Context::scaleObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, const helios::vec3 &scalefact ){
2675 for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
2676 getObjectPointer(ID)->scale(scalefact);
2677 }
2678}
2679
2680std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( uint ObjID ) const{
2681
2682 std::vector<uint> IDs{ObjID};
2683 std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(IDs);
2684 return output_UUIDs;
2685}
2686
2687std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ) const{
2688
2689 std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs;
2690
2691 for(uint i=0;i<ObjIDs.size();i++)
2692 {
2693 CompoundObject* pointer = getObjectPointer(ObjIDs.at(i));
2694 std::vector<uint> current_UUIDs = pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2695 output_UUIDs.insert( output_UUIDs.end(), current_UUIDs.begin(), current_UUIDs.end() );
2696 }
2697 return output_UUIDs;
2698}
2699
2700std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( const std::vector<std::vector<uint> > &ObjIDs ) const{
2701
2702 std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs;
2703
2704 for( uint j=0; j<ObjIDs.size(); j++ ) {
2705 for (uint i = 0; i < ObjIDs.at(j).size(); i++) {
2706 CompoundObject *pointer = getObjectPointer(ObjIDs.at(j).at(i));
2707 std::vector<uint> current_UUIDs = pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2708 output_UUIDs.insert(output_UUIDs.end(), current_UUIDs.begin(), current_UUIDs.end());
2709 }
2710 }
2711 return output_UUIDs;
2712}
2713
2714helios::ObjectType Context::getObjectType( uint ObjID ) const{
2715 return getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getObjectType();
2716}
2717
2718float Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const uint &ObjectID) const{
2719
2720 if( getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
2721 {
2722 std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID<< " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
2723 return 0.0;
2724
2725 }else{
2726
2727 if(!(getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
2728 std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID << " is missing primitives. Area ratio calculated is area of non-missing subpatches divided by the area of an individual subpatch." << std::endl;
2729 }
2730
2731 int2 subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSubdivisionCount();
2732 if(subdiv.x == int(1) && subdiv.y == int(1) )
2733 {
2734 return 1.0;
2735 }else{
2736 float area = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getArea();
2737 vec2 size = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSize();
2738
2739 float subpatch_area = (size.x/float(subdiv.x))*(size.y/float(subdiv.y));
2740 return area/subpatch_area;
2741 }
2742
2743 }
2744}
2745
2746std::vector<float> Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs) const {
2747
2748 std::vector<float> AreaRatios(ObjectIDs.size());
2749 for( uint i=0; i<ObjectIDs.size(); i++ ){
2750 AreaRatios.at(i) = getTileObjectAreaRatio(ObjectIDs.at(i));
2751 }
2752
2753 return AreaRatios;
2754}
2755
2756void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, int2 new_subdiv)
2757{
2758
2759 //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
2760 std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
2761 std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
2762
2763
2764 std::vector<std::string> tex;
2765 // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
2766 for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
2767 {
2768
2769 //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
2770 if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
2771 {
2772 std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
2773 }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
2774 std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
2775 }else{
2776 //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
2777 Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
2778 if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
2779 tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
2780 }else{ //texture
2781 textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
2782 tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
2783 }
2784 }
2785 }
2786
2787 //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
2788 for(unsigned int tile_ObjectID : tile_ObjectIDs){
2789
2790 Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectID);
2791 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2792
2793 vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
2794 vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
2795 vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
2796 SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
2797 RGBcolor color = getPrimitiveColor(UUIDs_old.front());
2798
2799 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
2800
2801 for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
2802 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectID);
2803 }
2804
2805 current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
2806 current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
2807 deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
2808 }
2809
2810 // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
2811 sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
2812 std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
2813 it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
2814 tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
2815
2816 //create object templates for all the unique texture files
2817 std::vector<uint> object_templates;
2818 std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
2819 for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
2820 {
2821 //create a template object for the current texture
2822 uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
2823 object_templates.emplace_back(object_template);
2824 std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2825 template_primitives.emplace_back(object_primitives);
2826 }
2827
2828 //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
2829 //for each textured tile object
2830 for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
2831 {
2832 //get info from current object
2833 Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
2834 std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
2835
2836 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2837
2838 vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
2839 vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
2840 vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
2841 SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
2842
2843 //for unique textures
2844 for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
2845 {
2846 //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
2847 if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
2848 {
2849 //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
2850 std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
2851
2852 // change the objectID for the new primitives
2853 setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
2854 current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
2855 current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
2856
2857 //delete the original object primitives
2858 deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
2859
2860 float IM[16];
2861 makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
2862 current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
2863
2864 current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
2865
2866 //transform based on original object data
2867 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
2868 current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
2869 }
2870 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
2871 current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
2872 }
2873 current_object_pointer->translate(center);
2874
2875 }
2876 }
2877 }
2878
2879
2880 //delete the template (objects and primitives)
2881 deleteObject(object_templates);
2882
2883}
2884
2885void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, float area_ratio)
2886{
2887
2888 //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
2889 std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
2890 std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
2891
2892 std::vector<std::string> tex;
2893 // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
2894 for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
2895 {
2896 //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
2897 if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
2898 {
2899 std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
2900 }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
2901 std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
2902 }else{
2903 //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
2904 Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
2905 if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
2906 tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
2907 }else{ //texture
2908 textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
2909 tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
2910 }
2911 }
2912 }
2913
2914 //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
2915 for(uint i=0;i<tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
2916 {
2917 Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
2918 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
2919
2920 vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
2921 vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
2922 vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
2923 SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
2924 RGBcolor color = getPrimitiveColor(UUIDs_old.front());
2925
2926 float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
2927
2928 // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
2929 float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
2930 float subpatch_per_x = size.x / subpatch_dimension;
2931 float subpatch_per_y = size.y / subpatch_dimension;
2932
2933 float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
2934 float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
2935
2936 int2 new_subdiv;
2937 if((int)area_ratio == 1){
2938 new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
2939 }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
2940 new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
2941 }else{
2942 new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
2943 }
2944
2945
2946 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
2947
2948 for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
2949 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
2950 }
2951
2952 current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
2953 current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
2954 deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
2955 }
2956
2957 // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
2958 sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
2959 std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
2960 it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
2961 tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
2962
2963 //create object templates for all the unique texture files
2964 // the assumption here is that all tile objects with the same texture have the same aspect ratio
2965 //if this is not true then the copying method won't work well because a new template will need to be created for each texture/aspect ratio combination
2966
2967 std::vector<uint> object_templates;
2968 std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
2969 for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
2970 {
2971 //here we just want to get one tile object with the matching texture
2972 uint ii;
2973 for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
2974 {
2975 //get info from current object
2976 Tile* current_object_pointer_b = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
2977 std::string current_texture_file_b = current_object_pointer_b->getTextureFile();
2978 //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
2979 if(current_texture_file_b == tex.at(j))
2980 {
2981 ii=i;
2982 break;
2983 }
2984 }
2985
2986 //get info from current object
2987 Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(ii));
2988 vec2 tile_size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
2989 float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
2990
2991 // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
2992 float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
2993 float subpatch_per_x = tile_size.x / subpatch_dimension;
2994 float subpatch_per_y = tile_size.y / subpatch_dimension;
2995
2996 float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
2997 float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
2998
2999 int2 new_subdiv;
3000 if((int)area_ratio == 1){
3001 new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
3002 }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
3003 new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
3004 }else{
3005 new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
3006 }
3007
3008 //create a template object for the current texture
3009 uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
3010 object_templates.emplace_back(object_template);
3011 std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
3012 template_primitives.emplace_back(object_primitives);
3013 }
3014
3015 //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
3016 //for each textured tile object
3017 for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
3018 {
3019 //get info from current object
3020 Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
3021 // std::string current_texture_file = getPrimitivePointer_private(current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0))->getTextureFile();
3022 std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
3023 // std::cout << "current_texture_file for ObjID " << textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i) << " = " << current_texture_file << std::endl;
3024 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
3025
3026 vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
3027 vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
3028 vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
3029 SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
3030
3031 //for unique textures
3032 for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
3033 {
3034 //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
3035 if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
3036 {
3037 //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
3038 std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
3039
3040 // change the objectID for the new primitives
3041 setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
3042
3043 int2 new_subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(object_templates.at(j))->getSubdivisionCount();
3044 current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
3045 current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
3046
3047 //delete the original object primitives
3048 deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
3049
3050 float IM[16];
3051 makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
3052 current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
3053
3054 current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
3055
3056 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3057 current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
3058 }
3059 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3060 current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
3061 }
3062 current_object_pointer->translate(center);
3063
3064 }
3065 }
3066 }
3067
3068 //delete the template (objects and primitives)
3069 deleteObject(object_templates);
3070
3071}
3072
3073Tile::Tile(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const int2 &a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {
3074
3075 makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3076
3077 OID = a_OID;
3078 type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_TILE;
3079 UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
3080 subdiv = a_subdiv;
3081 texturefile = a_texturefile;
3082 context = a_context;
3083
3084}
3085
3086Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer(uint ObjID ) const{
3087 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
3088 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
3089 }
3090 return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
3091}
3092
3093helios::vec2 Tile::getSize() const{
3094 std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
3095 float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3096 float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3097 return make_vec2(l,w);
3098}
3099
3100vec3 Tile::getCenter() const{
3101
3102 vec3 center;
3103 vec3 Y;
3104 Y.x = 0.f;
3105 Y.y = 0.f;
3106 Y.z = 0.f;
3107
3108 center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
3109 center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
3110 center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
3111
3112 return center;
3113
3114}
3115
3116
3117helios::int2 Tile::getSubdivisionCount() const{
3118 return subdiv;
3119}
3120
3121void Tile::setSubdivisionCount( const helios::int2 &a_subdiv ){
3122 subdiv = a_subdiv;
3123}
3124
3125
3126std::vector<helios::vec3> Tile::getVertices() const{
3127
3128 std::vector<helios::vec3> vertices;
3129 vertices.resize(4);
3130
3131 //subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
3132 //Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
3133 //Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
3134 //Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
3135 //Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
3136
3137
3138 vec3 Y[4];
3139 Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
3140 Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
3141 Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
3142 Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
3143
3144 for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
3145 vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
3146 vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
3147 vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
3148 }
3149
3150 // vertices.at(0) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.front() ).at(0);
3151 // vertices.at(1) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x-1 ) ).at(1);
3152 // vertices.at(2) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-1 ) ).at(2);
3153 // vertices.at(3) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-subdiv.x ) ).at(3);
3154
3155 return vertices;
3156
3157}
3158
3159vec3 Tile::getNormal() const{
3160
3161 return context->getPrimitiveNormal( UUIDs.front() );
3162
3163}
3164
3165std::vector<helios::vec2> Tile::getTextureUV() const{
3166
3167 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv{ make_vec2(0,0), make_vec2(1,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_vec2(0,1) };
3168
3169 return uv;
3170
3171}

3192
3193helios::vec3 Sphere::getRadius() const{
3194
3195// vec3 n0(0,0,0), n1(1,0,0);
3196// vec3 n0_T, n1_T;
3197//
3198// vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3199// vecmult(transform,n1,n1_T);
3200//
3201// return (n1_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3202
3203 vec3 n0(0,0,0);
3204 vec3 nx(1,0,0);
3205 vec3 ny(0,1,0);
3206 vec3 nz(0,0,1);
3207 vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
3208
3209 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3210 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3211 vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
3212 vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
3213
3214 vec3 radii;
3215 radii.x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3216 radii.y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3217 radii.z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3218
3219 return radii;
3220
3221}
3222
3223vec3 Sphere::getCenter() const{
3224
3225 vec3 center;
3226 vec3 Y;
3227 Y.x = 0.f;
3228 Y.y = 0.f;
3229 Y.z = 0.f;
3230
3231 center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
3232 center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
3233 center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
3234
3235 return center;
3236
3237}
3238

3240 return subdiv;
3241}

3244 subdiv = a_subdiv;
3245}

3269
3270std::vector<helios::vec3> Tube::getNodes() const{
3271
3272 std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
3273 nodes_T.resize( nodes.size() );
3274
3275 for( uint i=0; i<nodes.size(); i++ ){
3276 nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
3277 nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
3278 nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
3279 }
3280
3281 return nodes_T;
3282
3283}
3284
3285std::vector<float> Tube::getNodeRadii() const{
3286 std::vector<float> radius_T;
3287 radius_T.resize(radius.size());
3288 for( int i=0; i<radius.size(); i++ ){
3289
3290 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radius.at(i),0,0);
3291 vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
3292
3293 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3294 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3295
3296 radius_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3297
3298 }
3299 return radius_T;
3300}

3334
3335vec3 Box::getSize() const{
3336
3337 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0), nz(0,0,1);
3338
3339 vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
3340
3341 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3342 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3343 vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
3344 vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
3345
3346 float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3347 float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3348 float z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3349
3350 return make_vec3( x, y, z );
3351
3352}
3353
3354vec3 Box::getCenter() const{
3355
3356 vec3 center;
3357 vec3 Y;
3358 Y.x = 0.f;
3359 Y.y = 0.f;
3360 Y.z = 0.f;
3361
3362 center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
3363 center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
3364 center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
3365
3366 return center;
3367
3368}

3399vec2 Disk::getSize() const{
3400
3401 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0);
3402 vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T;
3403
3404 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3405 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3406 vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
3407
3408 float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3409 float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3410
3411 return make_vec2(x,y);
3412
3413}

3421 Y.z = 0.f;
3422
3423 center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
3424 center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
3425 center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];

3459Cone::Cone(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const vec3 &a_node0, const vec3 &a_node1, float a_radius0,
3460 float a_radius1, uint a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {

3466 UUIDs = a_UUIDs;

3469 context = a_context;
3470 nodes = {a_node0, a_node1};
3471 radii = {a_radius0, a_radius1};
3472

3476 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
3477 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getConeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
3478 }
3479 return dynamic_cast<Cone*>(objects.at(ObjID));
3480}
3481
3482std::vector<helios::vec3> Cone::getNodeCoordinates() const{
3483
3484 std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
3485
3486 nodes_T.resize( 2 );
3487
3488 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
3489 nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
3490 nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
3491 nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
3492 }
3493
3494 return nodes_T;
3495}
3496
3497helios::vec3 Cone::getNodeCoordinate(int node_index ) const{
3498
3499 if(node_index < 0 || node_index > 1 ){
3500 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNodeCoordinate): node number must be 0 or 1.");
3501 }
3502
3503 vec3 node_T;
3504
3505 node_T.x = transform[0] * nodes.at(node_index).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(node_index).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(node_index).z + transform[3];
3506 node_T.y = transform[4] * nodes.at(node_index).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(node_index).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(node_index).z + transform[7];
3507 node_T.z = transform[8] * nodes.at(node_index).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(node_index).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(node_index).z + transform[11];
3508
3509 return node_T;
3510}
3511
3512std::vector<float> Cone::getNodeRadii() const{
3513 std::vector<float> radii_T;
3514 radii_T.resize(2);
3515 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
3516
3517 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(i),0,0);
3518 vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
3519
3520 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3521 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3522
3523 radii_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3524
3525 }
3526 return radii_T;
3527}
3528
3529float Cone::getNodeRadius( int node_index ) const{
3530 if(node_index < 0 || node_index > 1 ){
3531 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNodeRadius): node number must be 0 or 1.");
3532 }
3533
3534 vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(node_index), 0, 0);
3535 vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
3536
3537 vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3538 vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3539
3540 return (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3541}
3542
3543uint Cone::getSubdivisionCount() const{
3544 return subdiv;
3545}
3546
3547void Cone::setSubdivisionCount( uint a_subdiv ){
3548 subdiv = a_subdiv;
3549}
3550
3551helios::vec3 Cone::getAxisUnitVector() const{
3552
3553 std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
3554 nodes_T.resize( 2 );
3555
3556 for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
3557 nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
3558 nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
3559 nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
3560 }
3561
3562 helios::vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
3563 float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
3564 axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
3565
3566 return axis_unit_vector;
3567}
3568
3569float Cone::getLength() const{
3570
3571 std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
3572 nodes_T.resize( 2);
3573
3574 for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
3575 nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
3576 nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
3577 nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
3578 }
3579
3580 float length = powf(powf(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z, 2), 0.5);
3581 return length;
3582}
3583
3584void Cone::scaleLength( float S ){
3585
3586 //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
3587 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeCoordinates();
3588 std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
3589
3590 // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
3591 vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
3592 float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
3593 axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
3594
3595 //translate node 0 back to origin
3596 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
3597
3598 //rotate the cone to align with z axis
3599 helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
3600 //get the axis about which to rotate
3601 vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
3602 //get the angle to rotate
3603 float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
3604 float angle = acos_safe(dot);
3605
3606 //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
3607 if(angle != float(0.0)){
3608 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
3609 }
3610
3611 // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
3612 float T[16], T_prim[16];
3613 makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(1,1,S), T);
3614 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3615 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
3616 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
3617 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
3618 matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
3619 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
3620 }
3621 }
3622
3623 //rotate back
3624 if(angle != 0.0){
3625 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
3626 }
3627
3628 // //translate back
3629 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
3630
3631}
3632
3633void Cone::scaleGirth( float S ){
3634
3635 //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
3636 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeCoordinates();
3637 std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
3638
3639 // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
3640 vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
3641 float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
3642 axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
3643
3644 //translate node 0 back to origin
3645 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
3646
3647 //rotate the cone to align with z axis
3648 helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
3649 //get the axis about which to rotate
3650 vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
3651 //get the angle to rotate
3652 float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
3653 float angle = acos_safe(dot);
3654 //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
3655 if(angle != float(0.0)){
3656 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
3657 }
3658
3659 // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
3660 float T[16], T_prim[16];
3661 makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(S,S,1), T);
3662 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3663 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
3664 if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
3665 context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
3666 matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
3667 context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
3668 }
3669 }
3670
3671 //rotate back
3672 if(angle != 0.0){
3673 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
3674 }
3675
3676 // //translate back
3677 context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
3678
3679}
3680
3681uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
3682 return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,{radius,radius,radius},{0.f,0.75f,0.f}); //Default color is green
3683}
3684
3685uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
3686 return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,{radius,radius,radius},color);
3687}
3688
3689uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
3690 return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,{radius,radius,radius},texturefile);
3691}
3692
3693uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec3 &radius ){
3694
3695 return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,radius,{0.f,0.75f,0.f}); //Default color is green
3696
3697}
3698
3699uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec3 &radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
3700
3701 if( radius.x<=0.f || radius.y<=0.f || radius.z<=0.f ){
3702 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive.");
3703 }
3704
3705 std::vector<uint> UUID;
3706
3707 float theta;
3708 float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
3709 float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
3710
3711 vec3 cart;
3712
3713 //bottom cap
3714 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3715
3716 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
3717 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3718 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3719 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3720 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3721 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3722
3723 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
3724
3725 }
3726
3727 //top cap
3728 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3729
3730 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
3731 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3732 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3733 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3734 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3735 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3736
3737 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
3738
3739 }
3740
3741 //middle
3742 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3743 for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
3744
3745 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3746 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3747 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3748 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3749 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3750 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3751 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3752 vec3 v3 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3753
3754 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
3755 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
3756
3757 }
3758 }
3759
3760 auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
3761
3762 float T[16], transform[16];
3763 sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
3764
3765 makeScaleMatrix(radius,T);
3766 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3767
3768 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
3769 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3770
3771 sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
3772
3773 sphere_new->setColor( color );
3774
3775 for( uint p : UUID){
3776 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
3777 }
3778
3779 objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
3780 currentObjectID++;
3781 return currentObjectID-1;
3782
3783
3784}
3785
3786uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec3 &radius, const char* texturefile ){
3787
3788 if( radius.x<=0.f || radius.y<=0.f || radius.z<=0.f ){
3789 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive.");
3790 }
3791
3792 std::vector<uint> UUID;
3793
3794 float theta;
3795 float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
3796 float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
3797
3798 vec3 cart;
3799
3800 //bottom cap
3801 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3802
3803 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
3804 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3805 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3806 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3807 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3808 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3809
3810 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
3811 n0.normalize();
3812 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
3813 n1.normalize();
3814 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
3815 n2.normalize();
3816
3817 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3818 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3819 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3820
3821 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
3822 uv2.x = 1;
3823 }
3824
3825 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
3826
3827 }
3828
3829 //top cap
3830 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3831
3832 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
3833 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3834 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3835 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3836 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3837 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3838
3839 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
3840 n0.normalize();
3841 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
3842 n1.normalize();
3843 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
3844 n2.normalize();
3845
3846 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3847 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3848 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3849
3850 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
3851 uv2.x = 1;
3852 }
3853
3854 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
3855
3856 }
3857
3858 //middle
3859 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
3860 for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
3861
3862 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3863 vec3 v0 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3864 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
3865 vec3 v1 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3866 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3867 vec3 v2 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3868 cart = sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(1.f, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
3869 vec3 v3 = center + make_vec3(cart.x*radius.x,cart.y*radius.y,cart.z*radius.z);
3870
3871 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
3872 n0.normalize();
3873 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
3874 n1.normalize();
3875 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
3876 n2.normalize();
3877 vec3 n3 = v3-center;
3878 n3.normalize();
3879
3880 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3881 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3882 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3883 vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
3884
3885 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
3886 uv2.x = 1;
3887 uv3.x = 1;
3888 }
3889
3890 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
3891 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
3892
3893 }
3894 }
3895
3896 auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
3897
3898 float T[16], transform[16];
3899 sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
3900
3901 makeScaleMatrix(radius,T);
3902 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3903
3904 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
3905 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3906
3907 sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
3908
3909 for( uint p : UUID){
3910 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
3911 }
3912
3913 objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
3914 currentObjectID++;
3915 return currentObjectID-1;
3916
3917
3918}
3919
3920uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv) {
3921
3922 RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
3923
3924 return addTileObject(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
3925}
3926
3927uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
3928
3929 if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
3930 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0.");
3931 }
3932 if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
3933 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0.");
3934 }
3935
3936 std::vector<uint> UUID;
3937
3938 vec2 subsize;
3939 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
3940 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
3941
3942 vec3 subcenter;
3943
3944 for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
3945 for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
3946
3947 subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
3948
3949 UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
3950
3951 if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
3952 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
3953 }
3954 if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
3955 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
3956 }
3957 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
3958
3959 }
3960 }
3961
3962 auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
3963
3964 float T[16], S[16], R[16];
3965
3966 float transform[16];
3967 tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
3968
3969 makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
3970 matmult(S,transform,transform);
3971
3972 makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
3973 matmult(R,transform,transform);
3974 makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
3975 matmult(R,transform,transform);
3976
3977 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
3978 matmult(T,transform,transform);
3979
3980 tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
3981
3982 tile_new->setColor( color );
3983
3984 for( uint p : UUID){
3985 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
3986 }
3987
3988 objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
3989 currentObjectID++;
3990 return currentObjectID-1;
3991
3992}
3993
3994uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
3995
3996 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
3997 std::string fn = texturefile;
3998 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
3999 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
4000 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTileObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
4001 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
4002 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTileObject): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
4003 }
4004
4005 if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
4006 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0.");
4007 }
4008 if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
4009 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0.");
4010 }
4011
4012 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4013
4014 vec2 subsize;
4015 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4016 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4017
4018 vec3 subcenter;
4019
4020 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
4021 uv.resize(4);
4022 vec2 uv_sub;
4023 uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
4024 uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
4025
4026 addTexture( texturefile );
4027 const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
4028 int2 sz;
4029 if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
4030 alpha = textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
4031 sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
4032 }
4033
4034 for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
4035 for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
4036
4037 subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
4038
4039 uv.at(0) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
4040 uv.at(1) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
4041 uv.at(2) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
4042 uv.at(3) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
4043
4044 auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, textures, 0, currentUUID ));
4045
4046 if( patch_new->getSolidFraction()==0 ){
4047 delete patch_new;
4048 continue;
4049 }
4050
4051 assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
4052 patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
4053
4054 patch_new->translate( subcenter );
4055
4056 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
4057 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
4058 }
4059 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
4060 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
4061 }
4062
4063 patch_new->translate( center );
4064
4065 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
4066 markGeometryDirty();
4067 currentUUID++;
4068 UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
4069
4070
4071 }
4072 }
4073
4074 auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
4075
4076 float T[16], S[16], R[16];
4077
4078 float transform[16];
4079 tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4080
4081 makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
4082 matmult(S,transform,transform);
4083
4084 makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
4085 matmult(R,transform,transform);
4086 makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
4087 matmult(R,transform,transform);
4088
4089 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
4090 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4091
4092 tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4093
4094 for( uint p : UUID){
4095 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4096 }
4097
4098 objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
4099 currentObjectID++;
4100 return currentObjectID-1;
4101
4102}
4103
4104uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
4105
4106 uint node_count = nodes.size();
4107
4108 std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
4109 color.resize(node_count);
4110
4111 for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
4112 color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4113 }
4114
4115 return addTubeObject(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
4116
4117}
4118
4119uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
4120
4121 const uint node_count = nodes.size();
4122
4123 if( node_count==0 ){
4124 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty.");
4125 }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
4126 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree.");
4127 }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
4128 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree.");
4129 }
4130
4131 vec3 vec, convec;
4132 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
4133 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
4134 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4135 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4136 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4137 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4138 xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
4139 normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
4140 }
4141 vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
4142
4143 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4144 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4145 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4146 }
4147
4148 for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
4149
4150 if(i==0){
4151 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4152 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4153 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4154 }else if(i==node_count-1){
4155 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4156 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4157 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4158 }else{
4159 vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
4160 vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
4161 vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
4162 }
4163
4164 float norm;
4165 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4166 norm=convec.magnitude();
4167 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4168 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4169 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4170 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4171 norm=nvec.magnitude();
4172 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4173 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4174 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4175
4176
4177
4178 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4179 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
4180 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
4181 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
4182
4183 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4184 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4185 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4186
4187 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
4188 }
4189
4190 }
4191
4192 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4193 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4194
4195 for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
4196 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4197
4198 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4199 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4200 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
4201
4202 //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4203 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
4204 //}
4205
4206 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4207 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
4208 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4209
4210 //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4211 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
4212 //}
4213
4214 }
4215 }
4216
4217 auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, color, Ndivs, "", this));
4218
4219 float T[16], transform[16];
4220 tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4221
4222 for( uint p : UUID){
4223 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4224 }
4225
4226 objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
4227 currentObjectID++;
4228 return currentObjectID-1;
4229
4230}
4231
4232uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
4233
4234 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
4235 std::string fn = texturefile;
4236 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
4237 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
4238 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
4239 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
4240 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
4241 }
4242
4243 const uint node_count = nodes.size();
4244
4245 if( node_count==0 ){
4246 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty.");
4247 }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
4248 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree.");
4249 }
4250
4251 vec3 vec, convec;
4252 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
4253 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
4254 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4255 std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
4256 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4257 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4258 uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
4259 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4260 xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
4261 normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
4262 uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
4263 }
4264 vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
4265
4266 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4267 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4268 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4269 }
4270
4271 for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
4272
4273 if(i==0){
4274 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4275 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4276 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4277 }else if(i==node_count-1){
4278 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4279 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4280 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4281 }else{
4282 vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
4283 vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
4284 vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
4285 }
4286
4287 float norm;
4288 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4289 norm=convec.magnitude();
4290 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4291 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4292 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4293 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4294 norm=nvec.magnitude();
4295 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4296 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4297 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4298
4299 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4300 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
4301 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
4302 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
4303
4304 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4305 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4306 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4307
4308 uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
4309 uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
4310
4311 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
4312 }
4313
4314 }
4315
4316 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4317 vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
4318 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4319
4320 for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
4321 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4322
4323 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4324 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4325 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
4326
4327 uv0 = uv[j][i];
4328 uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
4329 uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
4330
4331 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4332 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
4333 }
4334
4335 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4336 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
4337 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4338
4339 uv0 = uv[j][i];
4340 uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
4341 uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
4342
4343 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4344 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
4345 }
4346
4347 }
4348 }
4349
4350 std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
4351
4352 auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, colors, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
4353
4354 float T[16], transform[16];
4355 tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4356
4357 for( uint p : UUID){
4358 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4359 }
4360
4361 objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
4362 currentObjectID++;
4363 return currentObjectID-1;
4364
4365}
4366
4367uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
4368
4369 RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4370
4371 return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
4372}
4373
4374uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
4375 return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
4376}
4377
4378uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
4379 return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
4380}
4381
4382uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
4383
4384 if( size.x<=0 || size.y<=0 || size.z<=0 ){
4385 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Size of box must be positive.");
4386 }
4387 if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 || subdiv.z<1 ){
4388 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Number of box subdivisions must be positive.");
4389 }
4390
4391 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4392
4393 vec3 subsize;
4394 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4395 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4396 subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
4397
4398 vec3 subcenter;
4399 uint objID;
4400 std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
4401
4402 if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
4403
4404 // x-z faces (vertical)
4405
4406 //right
4407 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4408 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4409 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4410
4411 //left
4412 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4413 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4414 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4415
4416 // y-z faces (vertical)
4417
4418 //front
4419 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4420 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4421 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4422
4423 //back
4424 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4425 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4426 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4427
4428 // x-y faces (horizontal)
4429
4430 //top
4431 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4432 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4433 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4434
4435 //bottom
4436 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4437 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4438 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4439
4440 }else{ //normals point outward
4441
4442 // x-z faces (vertical)
4443
4444 //right
4445 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4446 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4447 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4448
4449 //left
4450 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4451 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4452 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4453
4454 // y-z faces (vertical)
4455
4456 //front
4457 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4458 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4459 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4460
4461 //back
4462 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4463 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4464 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4465
4466 // x-y faces (horizontal)
4467
4468 //top
4469 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4470 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4471 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4472
4473 //bottom
4474 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4475 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4476 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4477
4478 }
4479
4480 auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
4481
4482 float T[16], transform[16];
4483 box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4484
4485 makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
4486 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4487
4488 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
4489 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4490
4491 box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4492
4493 box_new->setColor( color );
4494
4495 for( uint p : UUID){
4496 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4497 }
4498
4499 objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
4500 currentObjectID++;
4501 return currentObjectID-1;
4502
4503}
4504
4505uint Context::addBoxObject(vec3 center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
4506
4507 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
4508 std::string fn = texturefile;
4509 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
4510 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
4511 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addBoxObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
4512 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
4513 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addBoxObject): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
4514 }
4515
4516 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4517
4518 vec3 subsize;
4519 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4520 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4521 subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
4522
4523 vec3 subcenter;
4524 uint objID;
4525 std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
4526
4527 if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
4528
4529 // x-z faces (vertical)
4530
4531 //right
4532 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4533 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4534 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4535
4536 //left
4537 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4538 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4539 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4540
4541 // y-z faces (vertical)
4542
4543 //front
4544 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4545 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4546 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4547
4548 //back
4549 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4550 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4551 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4552
4553 // x-y faces (horizontal)
4554
4555 //top
4556 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4557 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4558 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4559
4560 //bottom
4561 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4562 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4563 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4564
4565 }else{ //normals point outward
4566
4567 // x-z faces (vertical)
4568
4569 //right
4570 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4571 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4572 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4573
4574 //left
4575 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
4576 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4577 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4578
4579 // y-z faces (vertical)
4580
4581 //front
4582 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4583 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4584 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4585
4586 //back
4587 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
4588 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4589 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4590
4591 // x-y faces (horizontal)
4592
4593 //top
4594 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4595 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4596 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4597
4598 //bottom
4599 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
4600 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4601 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4602
4603 }
4604
4605 auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
4606
4607 float T[16], transform[16];
4608 box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4609
4610 makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
4611 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4612
4613 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
4614 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4615
4616 box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4617
4618 for( uint p : UUID){
4619 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4620 }
4621
4622 objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
4623 currentObjectID++;
4624 return currentObjectID-1;
4625
4626
4627}
4628
