4629uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
4630 return addDiskObject(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
4631}
4632
4633uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
4634 return addDiskObject(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
4635}
4636
4637uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
4638 return addDiskObject(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
4639}
4640
4641uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
4642 return addDiskObject(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,color);
4643}
4644
4645uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
4646 return addDiskObject(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,texture_file);
4647}
4648
4649uint Context::addDiskObject(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
4650 return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
4651}
4652
4653uint Context::addDiskObject(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
4654
4655 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4656
4657 UUID.resize(Ndivs.x+Ndivs.x*(Ndivs.y-1)*2);
4658 int i=0;
4659 for( int r=0; r < Ndivs.y; r++ ) {
4660 for (int t = 0; t < Ndivs.x; t++) {
4661
4662 float dtheta = 2.f * float(M_PI) / float(Ndivs.x);
4663 float theta = dtheta*float(t);
4664 float theta_plus = dtheta*float(t+1);
4665
4666 float rx = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
4667 float ry = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
4668
4669 float rx_plus = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
4670 float ry_plus = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
4671
4672 if( r==0 ) {
4673 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), color);
4674 }else{
4675 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta), ry * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0), color);
4676 i++;
4677 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), color);
4678 }
4679 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.elevation, "y");
4680 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
4681 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate(center);
4682
4683 i++;
4684 }
4685 }
4686
4687 auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
4688
4689 float T[16], transform[16];
4690 disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4691
4692 makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
4693 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4694
4695 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
4696 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4697
4698 disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4699
4700 disk_new->setColor( color );
4701
4702 for( uint p : UUID){
4703 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4704 }
4705
4706 objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
4707 currentObjectID++;
4708 return currentObjectID-1;
4709
4710}
4711
4712uint Context::addDiskObject(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
4713
4714 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
4715 std::string fn = texture_file;
4716 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
4717 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
4718 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addDiskObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
4719 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texture_file) ){
4720 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addDiskObject): Texture file " + std::string(texture_file) + " does not exist.");
4721 }
4722
4723 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4724
4725 UUID.resize(Ndivs.x+Ndivs.x*(Ndivs.y-1)*2);
4726 int i=0;
4727 for( int r=0; r < Ndivs.y; r++ ) {
4728 for (int t = 0; t < Ndivs.x; t++) {
4729
4730 float dtheta = 2.f * float(M_PI) / float(Ndivs.x);
4731 float theta = dtheta*float(t);
4732 float theta_plus = dtheta*float(t+1);
4733
4734 float rx = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
4735 float ry = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
4736 float rx_plus = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
4737 float ry_plus = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
4738
4739 if( r==0 ) {
4740 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry_plus/size.y)));
4741 }else{
4742 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta), ry * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)));
4743 i++;
4744 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry_plus/size.y)));
4745 }
4746 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.elevation, "y");
4747 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
4748 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate(center);
4749
4750 i++;
4751 }
4752 }
4753
4754 auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texture_file, this));
4755
4756 float T[16], transform[16];
4757 disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4758
4759 makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
4760 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4761
4762 makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
4763 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4764
4765 disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4766
4767 for( uint p : UUID){
4768 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4769 }
4770
4771 objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
4772 currentObjectID++;
4773 return currentObjectID-1;
4774
4775}
4776
4777uint Context::addPolymeshObject(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
4778
4779 if( UUIDs.empty() ){
4780 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPolymeshObject): UUIDs array is empty. Cannot create polymesh object.");
4781 }else if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUIDs) ){
4782 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPolymeshObject): One or more of the provided UUIDs does not exist. Cannot create polymesh object.");
4783 }
4784
4785 auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs, "", this));
4786
4787 float T[16], transform[16];
4788 polymesh_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4789
4790 makeTranslationMatrix( getPrimitivePointer_private( UUIDs.front())->getVertices().front(),T);
4791 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4792
4793 polymesh_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4794
4795 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4796 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4797 }
4798
4799 objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
4800 currentObjectID++;
4801 return currentObjectID-1;
4802
4803}
4804
4805uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
4806
4807 RGBcolor color;
4808 color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4809 return addConeObject(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
4810}
4811
4812uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const RGBcolor &color ){
4813
4814 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
4815 std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
4816
4817 vec3 vec, convec;
4818 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
4819 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
4820 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4821 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4822 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4823 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4824 xyz.at(j).resize(2);
4825 normal.at(j).resize(2);
4826 }
4827 vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
4828
4829 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4830 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4831 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4832 }
4833
4834 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
4835
4836 if(i==0){
4837 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4838 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4839 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4840 }else if(i==1){
4841 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4842 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4843 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4844 }
4845
4846 float norm;
4847 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4848 norm=convec.magnitude();
4849 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4850 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4851 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4852 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4853 norm=nvec.magnitude();
4854 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4855 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4856 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4857
4858 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4859 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
4860 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
4861 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
4862
4863 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4864 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4865 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4866
4867 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
4868 }
4869
4870 }
4871
4872 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4873 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4874
4875 for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
4876 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4877
4878 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4879 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4880 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
4881
4882 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
4883
4884 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4885 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
4886 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4887
4888 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
4889
4890 }
4891 }
4892
4893 auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, "", this));
4894
4895 float T[16], transform[16];
4896 cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
4897
4898 makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
4899 matmult(T,transform,transform);
4900
4901 cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
4902
4903 for( uint p : UUID){
4904 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
4905 }
4906
4907 cone_new->setColor( color );
4908
4909 objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
4910 currentObjectID++;
4911 return currentObjectID-1;
4912
4913}
4914
4915uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
4916
4917 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
4918 std::string fn = texturefile;
4919 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
4920 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
4921 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addConeObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
4922 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
4923 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addConeObject): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
4924 }
4925
4926 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
4927 std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
4928
4929 vec3 vec, convec;
4930 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
4931 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
4932 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4933 std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
4934 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4935 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4936 uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
4937 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4938 xyz.at(j).resize(2);
4939 normal.at(j).resize(2);
4940 uv.at(j).resize(2);
4941 }
4942 vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
4943
4944 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4945 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4946 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4947 }
4948
4949 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
4950
4951 if(i==0){
4952 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4953 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4954 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4955 }else if(i==1){
4956 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4957 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4958 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4959 }
4960
4961 float norm;
4962 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4963 norm=convec.magnitude();
4964 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4965 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4966 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4967 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4968 norm=nvec.magnitude();
4969 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4970 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4971 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4972
4973 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4974 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
4975 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
4976 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
4977
4978 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4979 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4980 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4981
4982 uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
4983 uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
4984
4985 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
4986 }
4987
4988 }
4989
4990 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4991 vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
4992 std::vector<uint> UUID;
4993
4994 for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
4995 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4996
4997 v0 = xyz[j][i];
4998 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4999 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5000
5001 uv0 = uv[j][i];
5002 uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5003 uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
5004
5005 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5006 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5007 }
5008
5009 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5010 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5011 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5012
5013 uv0 = uv[j][i];
5014 uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
5015 uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5016
5017 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5018 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5019 }
5020
5021 }
5022 }
5023
5024 auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
5025
5026 float T[16], transform[16];
5027 cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5028
5029 makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
5030 matmult(T,transform,transform);
5031
5032 cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5033
5034 for( uint p : UUID){
5035 getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5036 }
5037
5038 objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
5039 currentObjectID++;
5040 return currentObjectID-1;
5041
5042}
5043
5044std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
5045
5046 RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5047
5048 return addSphere(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
5049
5050}
5051
5052std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
5053
5054 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5055
5056 float theta;
5057 float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
5058 float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
5059
5060 //bottom cap
5061 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5062
5063 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
5064 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5065 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5066
5067 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
5068
5069 }
5070
5071 //top cap
5072 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5073
5074 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
5075 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5076 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5077
5078 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
5079
5080 }
5081
5082 //middle
5083 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5084 for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
5085
5086 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5087 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5088 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5089 vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5090
5091 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
5092 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
5093
5094 }
5095 }
5096
5097 return UUID;
5098
5099
5100}
5101
5102std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
5103
5104 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5105 std::string fn = texturefile;
5106 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5107 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5108 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addSphereObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5109 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
5110 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addSphere): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
5111 }
5112
5113 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5114
5115 float theta;
5116 float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
5117 float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
5118
5119 //bottom cap
5120 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5121
5122 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
5123 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5124 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5125
5126 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
5127 n0.normalize();
5128 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
5129 n1.normalize();
5130 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
5131 n2.normalize();
5132
5133 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5134 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5135 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5136
5137 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
5138 uv2.x = 1;
5139 }
5140
5141 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
5142
5143 }
5144
5145 //top cap
5146 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5147
5148 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
5149 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5150 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5151
5152 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
5153 n0.normalize();
5154 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
5155 n1.normalize();
5156 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
5157 n2.normalize();
5158
5159 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5160 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5161 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5162
5163 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
5164 uv2.x = 1;
5165 }
5166
5167 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
5168
5169 }
5170
5171 //middle
5172 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5173 for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
5174
5175 vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5176 vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5177 vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5178 vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5179
5180 vec3 n0 = v0-center;
5181 n0.normalize();
5182 vec3 n1 = v1-center;
5183 n1.normalize();
5184 vec3 n2 = v2-center;
5185 n2.normalize();
5186 vec3 n3 = v3-center;
5187 n3.normalize();
5188
5189 vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5190 vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5191 vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5192 vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
5193
5194 if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
5195 uv2.x = 1;
5196 uv3.x = 1;
5197 }
5198
5199 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
5200 UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
5201
5202 }
5203 }
5204
5205 return UUID;
5206
5207
5208}
5209
5210std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv ){
5211
5212 RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5213
5214 return addTile(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
5215}
5216
5217std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
5218
5219 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5220
5221 vec2 subsize;
5222 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5223 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5224
5225 vec3 subcenter;
5226
5227 UUID.resize( subdiv.x*subdiv.y );
5228
5229 size_t t = 0;
5230 for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
5231 for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
5232
5233 subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
5234
5235 UUID[t] = addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
5236
5237 if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
5238 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
5239 }
5240 if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
5241 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
5242 }
5243 getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->translate( center );
5244
5245 t++;
5246
5247 }
5248 }
5249
5250 return UUID;
5251
5252}
5253
5254std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
5255
5256 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5257 std::string fn = texturefile;
5258 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5259 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5260 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTile): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5261 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
5262 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTile): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
5263 }
5264
5265 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5266
5267 vec2 subsize;
5268 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5269 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5270
5271 vec3 subcenter;
5272
5273 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
5274 uv.resize(4);
5275 vec2 uv_sub;
5276 uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
5277 uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
5278
5279 addTexture( texturefile );
5280 std::vector<std::vector<bool> > alpha;
5281 int2 sz;
5282 if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
5283 alpha = *textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
5284 sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
5285 }
5286
5287 for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
5288 for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
5289
5290 subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
5291
5292 uv[0] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
5293 uv[1] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
5294 uv[2] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
5295 uv[3] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
5296
5297 auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, textures, 0, currentUUID ));
5298
5299 if( patch_new->getSolidFraction()==0 ){
5300 delete patch_new;
5301 continue;
5302 }
5303
5304 assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
5305 patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
5306
5307 patch_new->translate( subcenter );
5308
5309 if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
5310 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
5311 }
5312 if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
5313 patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
5314 }
5315
5316 patch_new->translate( center );
5317
5318 primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
5319 markGeometryDirty();
5320 currentUUID++;
5321 UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
5322
5323
5324 }
5325 }
5326
5327 return UUID;
5328
5329}
5330
5331std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
5332
5333 uint node_count = nodes.size();
5334
5335 std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
5336 color.resize(node_count);
5337
5338 for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
5339 color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5340 }
5341
5342 return addTube(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
5343
5344}
5345
5346std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
5347
5348 const uint node_count = nodes.size();
5349
5350 if( node_count==0 ){
5351 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty.");
5352 }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
5353 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree.");
5354 }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
5355 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree.");
5356 }
5357
5358 vec3 vec, convec;
5359 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
5360 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
5361 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
5362 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
5363 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
5364 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5365 xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
5366 normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
5367 }
5368 vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
5369
5370 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5371 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5372 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5373 }
5374
5375 for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
5376
5377 if(i==0){
5378 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
5379 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
5380 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
5381 }else if(i==node_count-1){
5382 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
5383 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
5384 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
5385 }else{
5386 vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
5387 vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
5388 vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
5389 }
5390
5391 float norm;
5392 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
5393 norm=convec.magnitude();
5394 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
5395 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
5396 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
5397 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
5398 norm=nvec.magnitude();
5399 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
5400 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
5401 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
5402
5403
5404
5405 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5406 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
5407 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
5408 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
5409
5410 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
5411 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
5412 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
5413
5414 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
5415 }
5416
5417 }
5418
5419 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
5420 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5421
5422 for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
5423 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5424
5425 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5426 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5427 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5428
5429 //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5430 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
5431 //}
5432
5433 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5434 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5435 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5436
5437 //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5438 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
5439 //}
5440
5441 }
5442 }
5443
5444 return UUID;
5445
5446}
5447
5448std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
5449
5450 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5451 std::string fn = texturefile;
5452 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5453 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5454 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5455 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
5456 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
5457 }
5458
5459 const uint node_count = nodes.size();
5460
5461 if( node_count==0 ){
5462 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty.");
5463 }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
5464 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree.");
5465 }
5466
5467 vec3 vec, convec;
5468 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
5469 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
5470 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
5471 std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
5472 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
5473 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
5474 uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
5475 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5476 xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
5477 normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
5478 uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
5479 }
5480 vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
5481
5482 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5483 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5484 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5485 }
5486
5487 for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
5488
5489 if(i==0){
5490 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
5491 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
5492 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
5493 }else if(i==node_count-1){
5494 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
5495 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
5496 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
5497 }else{
5498 vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
5499 vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
5500 vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
5501 }
5502
5503 float norm;
5504 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
5505 norm=convec.magnitude();
5506 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
5507 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
5508 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
5509 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
5510 norm=nvec.magnitude();
5511 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
5512 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
5513 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
5514
5515 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5516 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
5517 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
5518 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
5519
5520 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
5521 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
5522 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
5523
5524 uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
5525 uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
5526
5527 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
5528 }
5529
5530 }
5531
5532 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
5533 vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
5534 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5535
5536 for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
5537 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5538
5539 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5540 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5541 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5542
5543 uv0 = uv[j][i];
5544 uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5545 uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
5546
5547 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5548 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5549 }
5550
5551 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5552 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5553 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5554
5555 uv0 = uv[j][i];
5556 uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
5557 uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5558
5559 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5560 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5561 }
5562
5563 }
5564 }
5565
5566 return UUID;
5567
5568}
5569
5570std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
5571
5572 RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5573
5574 return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
5575}
5576
5577std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
5578 return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
5579}
5580
5581std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
5582 return addBox(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
5583}
5584
5585std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
5586
5587 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5588
5589 vec3 subsize;
5590 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5591 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5592 subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
5593
5594 vec3 subcenter;
5595 std::vector<uint> U;
5596
5597 if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
5598
5599 // x-z faces (vertical)
5600
5601 //right
5602 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5603 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5604 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5605
5606 //left
5607 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5608 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5609 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5610
5611 // y-z faces (vertical)
5612
5613 //front
5614 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5615 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5616 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5617
5618 //back
5619 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5620 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5621 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5622
5623 // x-y faces (horizontal)
5624
5625 //top
5626 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5627 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5628 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5629
5630 //bottom
5631 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5632 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5633 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5634
5635 }else{ //normals point outward
5636
5637 // x-z faces (vertical)
5638
5639 //right
5640 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5641 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5642 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5643
5644 //left
5645 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5646 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5647 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5648
5649 // y-z faces (vertical)
5650
5651 //front
5652 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5653 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5654 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5655
5656 //back
5657 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5658 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5659 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5660
5661 // x-y faces (horizontal)
5662
5663 //top
5664 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5665 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5666 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5667
5668 //bottom
5669 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5670 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5671 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5672
5673 }
5674
5675 return UUID;
5676
5677}
5678
5679std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
5680
5681 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5682 std::string fn = texturefile;
5683 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5684 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5685 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addBox): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5686 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
5687 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addBox): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
5688 }
5689
5690 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5691
5692 vec3 subsize;
5693 subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5694 subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5695 subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
5696
5697 vec3 subcenter;
5698 std::vector<uint> U;
5699
5700 if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
5701
5702 // x-z faces (vertical)
5703
5704 //right
5705 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5706 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5707 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5708
5709 //left
5710 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5711 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5712 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5713
5714 // y-z faces (vertical)
5715
5716 //front
5717 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5718 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5719 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5720
5721 //back
5722 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5723 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5724 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5725
5726 // x-y faces (horizontal)
5727
5728 //top
5729 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5730 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5731 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5732
5733 //bottom
5734 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5735 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5736 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5737
5738 }else{ //normals point outward
5739
5740 // x-z faces (vertical)
5741
5742 //right
5743 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5744 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5745 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5746
5747 //left
5748 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
5749 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5750 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5751
5752 // y-z faces (vertical)
5753
5754 //front
5755 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5756 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5757 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5758
5759 //back
5760 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
5761 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5762 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5763
5764 // x-y faces (horizontal)
5765
5766 //top
5767 subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5768 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5769 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5770
5771 //bottom
5772 subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
5773 U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5774 UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5775
5776 }
5777
5778 return UUID;
5779
5780}
5781
5782std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
5783 return addDisk(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
5784}
5785
5786std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
5787 return addDisk(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
5788}
5789
5790std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
5791 return addDisk(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
5792}
5793
5794std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
5795 return addDisk(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,color);
5796}
5797
5798std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
5799 return addDisk(make_int2(Ndivs,1),center,size,rotation,texture_file);
5800}
5801
5802std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
5803 return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
5804}
5805
5806std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
5807
5808 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5809 UUID.resize(Ndivs.x+Ndivs.x*(Ndivs.y-1)*2);
5810 int i=0;
5811 for( int r=0; r < Ndivs.y; r++ ) {
5812 for (int t = 0; t < Ndivs.x; t++) {
5813
5814 float dtheta = 2.f * float(M_PI) / float(Ndivs.x);
5815 float theta = dtheta*float(t);
5816 float theta_plus = dtheta*float(t+1);
5817
5818 float rx = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
5819 float ry = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
5820
5821 float rx_plus = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
5822 float ry_plus = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
5823
5824 if( r==0 ) {
5825 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), color);
5826 }else{
5827 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta), ry * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0), color);
5828 i++;
5829 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), color);
5830 }
5831 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.elevation, "y");
5832 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
5833 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate(center);
5834
5835 i++;
5836 }
5837 }
5838
5839 return UUID;
5840
5841}
5842
5843std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(const int2 &Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
5844
5845 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5846 std::string fn = texture_file;
5847 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5848 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5849 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addDisk): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5850 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texture_file) ){
5851 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addDisk): Texture file " + std::string(texture_file) + " does not exist.");
5852 }
5853
5854 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5855 UUID.resize(Ndivs.x+Ndivs.x*(Ndivs.y-1)*2);
5856 int i=0;
5857 for( int r=0; r < Ndivs.y; r++ ) {
5858 for (int t = 0; t < Ndivs.x; t++) {
5859
5860 float dtheta = 2.f * float(M_PI) / float(Ndivs.x);
5861 float theta = dtheta*float(t);
5862 float theta_plus = dtheta*float(t+1);
5863
5864 float rx = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
5865 float ry = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r);
5866 float rx_plus = size.x/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
5867 float ry_plus = size.y/float(Ndivs.y)*float(r+1);
5868
5869 if( r==0 ) {
5870 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry_plus/size.y)));
5871 }else{
5872 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta), ry * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)));
5873 i++;
5874 UUID.at(i) = addTriangle(make_vec3(rx * cosf(theta_plus), ry * sinf(theta_plus), 0), make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta), ry_plus * sinf(theta), 0),make_vec3(rx_plus * cosf(theta_plus), ry_plus * sinf(theta_plus), 0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta)*ry_plus/size.y)), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(theta_plus)*rx_plus/size.x), 0.5f*(1.f+sinf(theta_plus)*ry_plus/size.y)));
5875 }
5876 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.elevation, "y");
5877 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
5878 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate(center);
5879
5880 i++;
5881 }
5882 }
5883
5884 return UUID;
5885
5886}
5887
5888std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
5889
5890 RGBcolor color;
5891 color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5892
5893 return addCone(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
5894
5895}
5896
5897std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, RGBcolor &color ){
5898
5899 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
5900 std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
5901
5902 vec3 vec, convec;
5903 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
5904 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
5905 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
5906 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
5907 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
5908 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5909 xyz.at(j).resize(2);
5910 normal.at(j).resize(2);
5911 }
5912 vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
5913
5914 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5915 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5916 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5917 }
5918
5919 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
5920
5921 if(i==0){
5922 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
5923 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
5924 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
5925 }else if(i==1){
5926 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
5927 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
5928 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
5929 }
5930
5931 float norm;
5932 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
5933 norm=convec.magnitude();
5934 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
5935 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
5936 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
5937 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
5938 norm=nvec.magnitude();
5939 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
5940 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
5941 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
5942
5943
5944
5945 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5946 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
5947 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
5948 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
5949
5950 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
5951 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
5952 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
5953
5954 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
5955 }
5956
5957 }
5958
5959 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
5960 std::vector<uint> UUID;
5961
5962 for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
5963 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5964
5965 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5966 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5967 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5968
5969 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
5970
5971 v0 = xyz[j][i];
5972 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5973 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5974
5975 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
5976
5977
5978 }
5979 }
5980
5981 return UUID;
5982
5983}
5984
5985std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
5986
5987 //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
5988 std::string fn = texturefile;
5989 std::string ext = getFileExtension(fn);
5990 if( ext != ".png" && ext != ".PNG" && ext != ".jpg" && ext != ".jpeg" && ext != ".JPG" && ext != ".JPEG" ){
5991 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addCone): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.");
5992 }else if( !doesTextureFileExist(texturefile) ){
5993 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addCone): Texture file " + std::string(texturefile) + " does not exist.");
5994 }
5995
5996 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
5997 std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
5998
5999 vec3 vec, convec;
6000 std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
6001 std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
6002 std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
6003 std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
6004 xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
6005 normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
6006 uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
6007 for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6008 xyz.at(j).resize(2);
6009 normal.at(j).resize(2);
6010 uv.at(j).resize(2);
6011 }
6012 vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
6013
6014 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6015 cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6016 sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6017 }
6018
6019 for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
6020
6021 if(i==0){
6022 vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
6023 vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
6024 vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
6025 }else if(i==1){
6026 vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
6027 vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
6028 vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
6029 }
6030
6031 float norm;
6032 convec = cross(nvec,vec);
6033 norm=convec.magnitude();
6034 convec.x=convec.x/norm;
6035 convec.y=convec.y/norm;
6036 convec.z=convec.z/norm;
6037 nvec = cross(vec,convec);
6038 norm=nvec.magnitude();
6039 nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
6040 nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
6041 nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
6042
6043 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6044 normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
6045 normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
6046 normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
6047
6048 xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
6049 xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
6050 xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
6051
6052 uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
6053 uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
6054
6055 normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
6056 }
6057
6058 }
6059
6060 vec3 v0, v1, v2;
6061 vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
6062 std::vector<uint> UUID;
6063
6064 for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
6065 for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6066
6067 v0 = xyz[j][i];
6068 v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6069 v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
6070
6071 uv0 = uv[j][i];
6072 uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
6073 uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
6074
6075 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6076 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
6077 }
6078
6079 v0 = xyz[j][i];
6080 v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
6081 v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6082
6083 uv0 = uv[j][i];
6084 uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
6085 uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
6086
6087 if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6088 UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
6089 }
6090
6091 }
6092 }
6093
6094 return UUID;
6095
6096}
6097
6098void Context::colorPrimitiveByDataPseudocolor( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data, const std::string &colormap, uint Ncolors ){
6099
6100 colorPrimitiveByDataPseudocolor(UUIDs,primitive_data,colormap, Ncolors,9999999,-9999999);
6101
6102}
6103
6104void Context::colorPrimitiveByDataPseudocolor( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data, const std::string &colormap, uint Ncolors, float data_min, float data_max ){
6105
6106 std::map<uint,float> pcolor_data;
6107
6108 float data_min_new=9999999;
6109 float data_max_new=-9999999;
6110 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
6111
6112 if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
6113 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::colorPrimitiveDataPseudocolor): primitive for UUID " << std::to_string(UUID) << " does not exist. Skipping this primitive." << std::endl;
6114 continue;
6115 }
6116
6117 float dataf=0;
6118 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data.c_str()) ) {
6119
6120 if( getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data.c_str())!=HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data.c_str())!=HELIOS_TYPE_INT && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data.c_str())!=HELIOS_TYPE_UINT && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data.c_str())!=HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
6121 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::colorPrimitiveDataPseudocolor): Only primitive data types of int, uint, float, and double are supported for this function. Skipping this primitive." << std::endl;
6122 continue;
6123 }
6124
6125 if (getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, primitive_data.c_str()) ==
6126 HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
6127 float data;
6128 getPrimitiveData(UUID, primitive_data.c_str(), data);
6129 dataf = data;
6130 } else if (getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, primitive_data.c_str()) ==
6131 HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
6132 double data;
6133 getPrimitiveData(UUID, primitive_data.c_str(), data);
6134 dataf = float(data);
6135 } else if (getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, primitive_data.c_str()) ==
6136 HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
6137 int data;
6138 getPrimitiveData(UUID, primitive_data.c_str(), data);
6139 dataf = float(data);
6140 } else if (getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, primitive_data.c_str()) ==
6141 HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
6142 uint data;
6143 getPrimitiveData(UUID, primitive_data.c_str(), data);
6144 dataf = float(data);
6145 }
6146 }
6147
6148 if( data_min==9999999 && data_max==-9999999 ) {
6149 if (dataf < data_min_new) {
6150 data_min_new = dataf;
6151 }
6152 if (dataf > data_max_new) {
6153 data_max_new = dataf;
6154 }
6155 }
6156
6157 pcolor_data[UUID] = dataf;
6158
6159 }
6160
6161 if( data_min==9999999 && data_max==-9999999 ) {
6162 data_min = data_min_new;
6163 data_max = data_max_new;
6164 }
6165
6166 std::vector<RGBcolor> colormap_data = generateColormap( colormap, Ncolors );
6167
6168 std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::string> > cmap_texture_filenames;
6169
6170 for( auto &data : pcolor_data ) {
6171
6172 uint UUID = data.first;
6173 float pdata = data.second;
6174
6175 std::string texturefile = getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID);
6176
6177 int cmap_ind = round((pdata - data_min) / (data_max - data_min) * float(Ncolors - 1));
6178
6179 if( cmap_ind<0 ){
6180 cmap_ind=0;
6181 }else if( cmap_ind>=Ncolors ){
6182 cmap_ind=Ncolors-1;
6183 }
6184
6185 if ( !texturefile.empty() && primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID)) { // primitive has texture with transparency channel
6186
6187// if (cmap_texture_filenames.find(texturefile) == cmap_texture_filenames.end()) {
6188// cmap_texture_filenames[texturefile] = generateTexturesFromColormap(texturefile, colormap_data);
6189// }
6190//
6191// setPrimitiveTextureFile( UUID, cmap_texture_filenames.at(texturefile).at(cmap_ind));
6192
6193 overridePrimitiveTextureColor(UUID);
6194 setPrimitiveColor(UUID, colormap_data.at(cmap_ind));
6195
6196 } else { // primitive does not have texture with transparency channel - assign constant color
6197
6198 if (!getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID).empty()) {
6199 overridePrimitiveTextureColor(UUID);
6200 }
6201
6202 setPrimitiveColor(UUID, colormap_data.at(cmap_ind));
6203 }
6204 }
6205
6206}
6207
6208std::vector<RGBcolor> Context::generateColormap( const std::vector<helios::RGBcolor> &ctable, const std::vector<float> &cfrac, uint Ncolors ){
6209
6210 if( Ncolors>9999 ){
6211 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::generateColormapTextures): Truncating number of color map textures to maximum value of 9999." << std::endl;
6212 }
6213
6214 if( ctable.size()!=cfrac.size() ){
6215 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::generateColormap): The length of arguments 'ctable' and 'cfrac' must match.");
6216 }
6217 if( ctable.empty() ){
6218 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::generateColormap): 'ctable' and 'cfrac' arguments contain empty vectors.");
6219 }
6220
6221 std::vector<RGBcolor> color_table;
6222 color_table.resize(Ncolors);
6223
6224 for (int i = 0; i < Ncolors; i++){
6225
6226 float frac = float(i)/float(Ncolors-1)*cfrac.back();
6227
6228 int j;
6229 for( j=0; j<cfrac.size()-1; j++ ){
6230 if( frac>=cfrac.at(j) && frac<=cfrac.at(j+1) ){
6231 break;
6232 }
6233 }
6234
6235 float cminus = std::fmaxf(0.f,cfrac.at(j));
6236 float cplus = std::fminf(1.f,cfrac.at(j+1));
6237
6238 float jfrac = (frac-cminus)/(cplus-cminus);
6239
6240 RGBcolor color;
6241 color.r = ctable.at(j).r+jfrac*(ctable.at(j+1).r-ctable.at(j).r);
6242 color.g = ctable.at(j).g+jfrac*(ctable.at(j+1).g-ctable.at(j).g);
6243 color.b = ctable.at(j).b+jfrac*(ctable.at(j+1).b-ctable.at(j).b);
6244
6245 color_table.at(i) = color;
6246
6247 }
6248
6249 return color_table;
6250
6251}
6252
6253std::vector<RGBcolor> Context::generateColormap( const std::string &colormap, uint Ncolors ){
6254
6255 std::vector<RGBcolor> ctable_c;
6256 std::vector<float> clocs_c;
6257
6258 if( colormap == "hot" ) {
6259
6260 ctable_c.resize(5);
6261 ctable_c.at(0) = make_RGBcolor(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
6262 ctable_c.at(1) = make_RGBcolor(0.5f, 0.f, 0.5f);
6263 ctable_c.at(2) = make_RGBcolor(1.f, 0.f, 0.f);
6264 ctable_c.at(3) = make_RGBcolor(1.f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6265 ctable_c.at(4) = make_RGBcolor(1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
6266
6267 clocs_c.resize(5);
6268 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6269 clocs_c.at(1) = 0.25f;
6270 clocs_c.at(2) = 0.5f;
6271 clocs_c.at(3) = 0.75f;
6272 clocs_c.at(4) = 1.f;
6273
6274 }else if( colormap == "cool") {
6275
6276 ctable_c.resize(2);
6277 ctable_c.at(1) = RGB::cyan;
6278 ctable_c.at(2) = RGB::magenta;
6279
6280 clocs_c.resize(2);
6281 clocs_c.at(1) = 0.f;
6282 clocs_c.at(2) = 1.f;
6283
6284 }else if( colormap == "lava" ) {
6285
6286 ctable_c.resize(5);
6287 ctable_c.at(0) = make_RGBcolor(0.f, 0.05f, 0.05f);
6288 ctable_c.at(1) = make_RGBcolor(0.f, 0.6f, 0.6f);
6289 ctable_c.at(2) = make_RGBcolor(1.f, 1.f, 1.f);
6290 ctable_c.at(3) = make_RGBcolor(1.f, 0.f, 0.f);
6291 ctable_c.at(4) = make_RGBcolor(0.5f, 0.f, 0.f);
6292
6293 clocs_c.resize(5);
6294 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6295 clocs_c.at(1) = 0.4f;
6296 clocs_c.at(2) = 0.5f;
6297 clocs_c.at(3) = 0.6f;
6298 clocs_c.at(4) = 1.f;
6299
6300 }else if( colormap == "rainbow" ){
6301
6302 ctable_c.resize(4);
6303 ctable_c.at(0) = RGB::navy;
6304 ctable_c.at(1) = RGB::cyan;
6305 ctable_c.at(2) = RGB::yellow;
6306 ctable_c.at(3) = make_RGBcolor( 0.75f, 0.f, 0.f );
6307
6308 clocs_c.resize(4);
6309 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6310 clocs_c.at(1) = 0.3f;
6311 clocs_c.at(2) = 0.7f;
6312 clocs_c.at(3) = 1.f;
6313
6314 }else if( colormap == "parula" ){
6315
6316 ctable_c.resize(4);
6317 ctable_c.at(0) = RGB::navy;
6318 ctable_c.at(1) = make_RGBcolor(0,0.6,0.6);
6319 ctable_c.at(2) = RGB::goldenrod;
6320 ctable_c.at(3) = RGB::yellow;
6321
6322 clocs_c.resize(4);
6323 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6324 clocs_c.at(1) = 0.4f;
6325 clocs_c.at(2) = 0.7f;
6326 clocs_c.at(3) = 1.f;
6327
6328 }else if( colormap == "gray" ) {
6329
6330 ctable_c.resize(2);
6331 ctable_c.at(0) = RGB::black;
6332 ctable_c.at(1) = RGB::white;
6333
6334 clocs_c.resize(2);
6335 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6336 clocs_c.at(1) = 1.f;
6337
6338 }else if( colormap == "green" ) {
6339
6340 ctable_c.resize(2);
6341 ctable_c.at(0) = RGB::black;
6342 ctable_c.at(1) = RGB::green;
6343
6344 clocs_c.resize(2);
6345 clocs_c.at(0) = 0.f;
6346 clocs_c.at(1) = 1.f;
6347
6348 }else{
6349 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::generateColormapTextures): Unknown colormap "+colormap+".");
6350 }
6351
6352 return generateColormap( ctable_c, clocs_c, Ncolors );
6353
6354}
6355
6356std::vector<std::string> Context::generateTexturesFromColormap( const std::string &texturefile, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &colormap_data ){
6357
6358 uint Ncolors = colormap_data.size();
6359
6360 // check that texture file exists
6361 std::ifstream tfile(texturefile);
6362 if (!tfile) {
6363 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::generateTexturesFromColormap): Texture file " + texturefile + " does not exist, or you do not have permission to read it.");
6364 }
6365 tfile.close();
6366
6367 // get file extension
6368 std::string file_ext = getFileExtension(texturefile);
6369
6370 // get file base/stem
6371 std::string file_base = getFileStem(texturefile);
6372
6373 std::vector<RGBcolor> color_table;
6374 color_table.resize(Ncolors);
6375
6376 std::vector<std::string> texture_filenames(Ncolors);
6377
6378 if (file_ext == "png" || file_ext == "PNG") {
6379
6380 std::vector<RGBAcolor> pixel_data;
6381 uint width, height;
6382 readPNG(texturefile, width, height, pixel_data);
6383
6384 for (int i = 0; i < Ncolors; i++) {
6385
6386 std::ostringstream filename;
6387 filename << "lib/images/colormap_" << file_base << "_" << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << std::to_string(i) << ".png";
6388
6389 texture_filenames.at(i) = filename.str();
6390
6391 RGBcolor color = colormap_data.at(i);
6392
6393 for (int row = 0; row < height; row++) {
6394 for (int col = 0; col < width; col++) {
6395 pixel_data.at(row * width + col) = make_RGBAcolor(color, pixel_data.at(row * width + col).a);
6396 }
6397 }
6398
6399 writePNG(filename.str(), width, height, pixel_data);
6400 }
6401
6402 }
6403
6404 return texture_filenames;
6405
6406}
6407
6408Context::~Context(){
6409
6410 for(auto & primitive : primitives){
6411 Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first);
6412 delete prim;
6413 }
6414
6415 for(auto & object : objects){
6416 CompoundObject* obj = getObjectPointer(object.first);
6417 delete obj;
6418 }
6419
6420}
6421
6422PrimitiveType Context::getPrimitiveType(uint UUID) const {
6423 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType();
6424}
6425
6426void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(uint UUID, uint objID){
6427
6428 uint current_objID = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
6429 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(objID);
6430
6431 if(current_objID != uint(0) && current_objID!=objID )
6432 {
6433
6434 if( doesObjectExist(current_objID) ) {
6435 objects.at(current_objID)->deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
6436
6437 if(getObjectPointer_private(current_objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().size() == 0)
6438 {
6439 CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(current_objID);
6440 delete obj;
6441 objects.erase(current_objID);
6442 markGeometryDirty();
6443 }
6444 }
6445 }
6446
6447}
6448
6449void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, uint objID) {
6450 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6451 setPrimitiveParentObjectID(UUID, objID);
6452 }
6453}
6454
6455uint Context::getPrimitiveParentObjectID(uint UUID) const {
6456 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
6457}
6458
6459
6460std::vector<uint> Context::getUniquePrimitiveParentObjectIDs(std::vector<uint> UUIDs) const {
6461 return getUniquePrimitiveParentObjectIDs(UUIDs, false);
6462}
6463
6464
6465std::vector<uint> Context::getUniquePrimitiveParentObjectIDs(std::vector<uint> UUIDs, bool include_ObjID_zero) const {
6466
6467 //vector of parent object ID for each primitive
6468 std::vector<uint> primitiveObjIDs;
6469 primitiveObjIDs.resize(UUIDs.size());
6470 for(uint i=0;i<UUIDs.size();i++)
6471 {
6472 primitiveObjIDs.at(i) = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->getParentObjectID();
6473 }
6474
6475 // sort
6476 std::sort(primitiveObjIDs.begin(), primitiveObjIDs.end());
6477
6478 // unique
6479 auto it = unique(primitiveObjIDs.begin(), primitiveObjIDs.end());
6480 primitiveObjIDs.resize(distance(primitiveObjIDs.begin(), it));
6481
6482 // remove object ID = 0 from the output if desired and it exisits
6483 if(include_ObjID_zero == false & primitiveObjIDs.at(0) == uint(0))
6484 {
6485 primitiveObjIDs.erase(primitiveObjIDs.begin());
6486 }
6487
6488 return primitiveObjIDs;
6489}
6490
6491float Context::getPrimitiveArea(uint UUID) const {
6492 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getArea();
6493}
6494
6495void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( uint UUID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
6496 std::vector<uint> UUIDs{UUID};
6497 getPrimitiveBoundingBox( UUIDs, min_corner, max_corner );
6498}
6499
6500void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
6501
6502
6503 uint p=0;
6504 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
6505
6506 if ( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
6507 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox): Primitive with UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
6508 }
6509
6510 const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
6511
6512 if( p==0 ){
6513 min_corner = vertices.front();
6514 max_corner = min_corner;
6515 }
6516
6517 for ( const vec3 &vert : vertices ){
6518 if ( vert.x<min_corner.x ){
6519 min_corner.x = vert.x;
6520 }
6521 if ( vert.y<min_corner.y ){
6522 min_corner.y = vert.y;
6523 }
6524 if ( vert.z<min_corner.z ){
6525 min_corner.z = vert.z;
6526 }
6527 if ( vert.x>max_corner.x ){
6528 max_corner.x = vert.x;
6529 }
6530 if ( vert.y>max_corner.y ){
6531 max_corner.y = vert.y;
6532 }
6533 if ( vert.z>max_corner.z ){
6534 max_corner.z = vert.z;
6535 }
6536 }
6537
6538 p++;
6539 }
6540}
6541
6542helios::vec3 Context::getPrimitiveNormal(uint UUID) const {
6543 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getNormal();
6544}
6545
6546void Context::getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(uint UUID, float (&T)[16] ) const {
6547 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTransformationMatrix( T );
6548}
6549
6550void Context::setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(uint UUID, float (&T)[16] ) {
6551 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
6552}
6553
6554void Context::setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, float (&T)[16] ) {
6555 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6556 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
6557 }
6558}
6559
6560std::vector<helios::vec3> Context::getPrimitiveVertices(uint UUID) const {
6561 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getVertices();
6562}
6563
6564
6565helios::RGBcolor Context::getPrimitiveColor(uint UUID) const {
6566 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getColor();
6567}
6568
6569helios::RGBcolor Context::getPrimitiveColorRGB(uint UUID) const {
6570 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getColorRGB();
6571}
6572
6573helios::RGBAcolor Context::getPrimitiveColorRGBA(uint UUID) const {
6574 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getColorRGBA();
6575}
6576
6577void Context::setPrimitiveColor(uint UUID, const RGBcolor &color) {
6578 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setColor( color );
6579}
6580
6581void Context::setPrimitiveColor(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const RGBcolor &color) {
6582 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6583 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setColor(color);
6584 }
6585}
6586
6587void Context::setPrimitiveColor(uint UUID, const RGBAcolor &color) {
6588 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setColor( color );
6589}
6590
6591void Context::setPrimitiveColor(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const RGBAcolor &color) {
6592 for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6593 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setColor(color);
6594 }
6595}
6596
6597std::string Context::getPrimitiveTextureFile( uint UUID ) const{
6598 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
6599}
6600
6601void Context::setPrimitiveTextureFile( uint UUID, const std::string &texturefile ){
6602 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setTextureFile(texturefile.c_str());
6603}
6604
6605helios::int2 Context::getPrimitiveTextureSize( uint UUID ) const{
6606 std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
6607 if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
6608 return textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
6609 }
6610 return make_int2(0,0);
6611}
6612
6613std::vector<helios::vec2> Context::getPrimitiveTextureUV( uint UUID ) const{
6614 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureUV();
6615}
6616
6617bool Context::primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel( uint UUID ) const{
6618 std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
6619 if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
6620 return textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel();
6621 }
6622 return false;
6623}
6624
6625const std::vector<std::vector<bool>> * Context::getPrimitiveTextureTransparencyData(uint UUID ) const{
6626 if(primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) ){
6627 const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > *data = textures.at(getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile()).getTransparencyData();
6628 return data;
6629 }else{
6630 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getPrimitiveTransparencyData): Texture transparency data does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + ".");
6631 return 0;
6632 }
6633}
6634
6635void Context::overridePrimitiveTextureColor( uint UUID ){
6636 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->overrideTextureColor();
6637}
6638
6639void Context::overridePrimitiveTextureColor( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
6640 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ) {
6641 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->overrideTextureColor();
6642 }
6643}
6644
6645void Context::usePrimitiveTextureColor( uint UUID ){
6646 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->useTextureColor();
6647}
6648
6649void Context::usePrimitiveTextureColor( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
6650 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ) {
6651 getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->useTextureColor();
6652 }
6653}
6654
6655bool Context::isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden( uint UUID ) const{
6656 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->isTextureColorOverridden();
6657}
6658
6659float Context::getPrimitiveSolidFraction( uint UUID ) const{
6660 return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getSolidFraction();
6661}
6662
6663void Context::printPrimitiveInfo(uint UUID) const{
6664
6665 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
6666 std::cout << "Info for UUID " << UUID << std::endl;
6667 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
6668
6669 PrimitiveType type = getPrimitiveType(UUID);
6670 std::string stype;
6671 if( type == 0){
6672 stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
6673 }else if(type == 1){
6674 stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
6675 }else if(type == 2){
6676 stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL";
6677 }
6678
6679 std::cout << "Type: " << stype << std::endl;
6680 std::cout << "Parent ObjID: " << getPrimitiveParentObjectID(UUID) << std::endl;
6681 std::cout << "Surface Area: " << getPrimitiveArea(UUID) << std::endl;
6682 std::cout << "Normal Vector: " << getPrimitiveNormal(UUID) << std::endl;
6683
6684 if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH)
6685 {
6686 std::cout << "Patch Center: " << getPatchCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
6687 std::cout << "Patch Size: " << getPatchSize(UUID) << std::endl;
6688
6689 }else if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL){
6690
6691 std::cout << "Voxel Center: " << getVoxelCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
6692 std::cout << "Voxel Size: " << getVoxelSize(UUID) << std::endl;
6693 }
6694
6695 std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
6696 std::cout << "Vertices: " << std::endl;
6697 for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
6698 {
6699 std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
6700 }
6701
6702 float T[16];
6703 getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T);
6704 std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
6705 std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
6706 std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
6707 std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
6708 std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
6709
6710 std::cout << "Color: " << getPrimitiveColor(UUID) << std::endl;
6711 std::cout << "Texture File: " << getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID) << std::endl;
6712 std::cout << "Texture Size: " << getPrimitiveTextureSize(UUID) << std::endl;
6713 std::cout << "Texture UV: " << std::endl;
6714 std::vector<vec2> uv = getPrimitiveTextureUV(UUID);
6715 for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
6716 {
6717 std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
6718 }
6719
6720 std::cout << "Texture Transparency: " << primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) << std::endl;
6721 std::cout << "Color Overridden: " << isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden(UUID) << std::endl;
6722 std::cout << "Solid Fraction: " << getPrimitiveSolidFraction(UUID) << std::endl;
6723
6724
6725 std::cout << "Primitive Data: " << std::endl;
6726 // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID);
6727 std::vector<std::string> pd = listPrimitiveData(UUID);
6728 for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
6729 {
6730 uint dsize = getPrimitiveDataSize(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
6731 HeliosDataType dtype = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
6732 std::string dstype;
6733
6734 if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
6735 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
6736 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
6737 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
6738 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
6739 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
6740 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
6741 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
6742 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
6743 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
6744 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
6745 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
6746 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
6747 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
6748 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
6749 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
6750 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
6751 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
6752 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
6753 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
6754 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
6755 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
6756 }else{
6757 assert(false);
6758 }
6759
6760
6761 std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
6762
6763
6764 if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
6765 std::vector<int> pdata;
6766 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6767 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6768 {
6769 if(j < 10){
6770 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6771 }else{
6772 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6773 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6774 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6775 break;
6776 }
6777
6778 }
6779 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
6780 std::vector<uint> pdata;
6781 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6782 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6783 {
6784 if(j < 10){
6785 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6786 }else{
6787 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6788 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6789 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6790 break;
6791 }
6792
6793 }
6794 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
6795 std::vector<float> pdata;
6796 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6797 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6798 {
6799 if(j < 10){
6800 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6801 }else{
6802 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6803 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6804 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6805 break;
6806 }
6807
6808 }
6809 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
6810 std::vector<double> pdata;
6811 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6812 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6813 {
6814 if(j < 10){
6815 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6816 }else{
6817 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6818 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6819 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6820 break;
6821 }
6822
6823 }
6824 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
6825 std::vector<vec2> pdata;
6826 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6827 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6828 {
6829 if(j < 10){
6830 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6831 }else{
6832 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6833 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6834 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6835 break;
6836 }
6837
6838 }
6839 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
6840 std::vector<vec3> pdata;
6841 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6842 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6843 {
6844 if(j < 10){
6845 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6846 }else{
6847 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6848 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6849 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6850 break;
6851 }
6852
6853 }
6854 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
6855 std::vector<vec4> pdata;
6856 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6857 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6858 {
6859 if(j < 10){
6860 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6861 }else{
6862 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6863 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6864 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6865 break;
6866 }
6867
6868 }
6869 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
6870 std::vector<int2> pdata;
6871 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6872 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6873 {
6874 if(j < 10){
6875 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6876 }else{
6877 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6878 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6879 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
