6880 break;
6881 }
6882
6883 }
6884 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
6885 std::vector<int3> pdata;
6886 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6887 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6888 {
6889 if(j < 10){
6890 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6891 }else{
6892 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6893 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6894 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6895 break;
6896 }
6897
6898 }
6899 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
6900 std::vector<int4> pdata;
6901 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6902 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6903 {
6904 if(j < 10){
6905 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6906 }else{
6907 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6908 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6909 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6910 break;
6911 }
6912
6913 }
6914 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
6915 std::vector<std::string> pdata;
6916 getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
6917 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
6918 {
6919 if(j < 10){
6920 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
6921 }else{
6922 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6923 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
6924 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
6925 break;
6926 }
6927
6928 }
6929 }else{
6930 assert(false);
6931 }
6932
6933 }
6934 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
6935}
6936
6937void Context::printObjectInfo(uint ObjID) const{
6938
6939 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
6940 std::cout << "Info for ObjID " << ObjID << std::endl;
6941 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
6942
6943 ObjectType otype = getObjectType(ObjID);
6944 std::string ostype;
6945 if( otype == 0){
6946 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TILE";
6947 }else if(otype == 1){
6948 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE";
6949 }else if(otype == 2){
6950 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE";
6951 }else if(otype == 3){
6952 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_BOX";
6953 }else if(otype == 4){
6954 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_DISK";
6955 }else if(otype == 5){
6956 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH";
6957 }else if(otype == 6){
6958 ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_CONE";
6959 }
6960
6961 std::cout << "Type: " << ostype << std::endl;
6962 std::cout << "Object Bounding Box Center: " << getObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
6963 std::cout << "One-sided Surface Area: " << getObjectArea(ObjID) << std::endl;
6964
6965 std::cout << "Primitive Count: " << getObjectPrimitiveCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
6966
6967 if(areObjectPrimitivesComplete(ObjID))
6968 {
6969 std::cout << "Object Primitives Complete" << std::endl;
6970 }else{
6971 std::cout << "Object Primitives Incomplete" << std::endl;
6972 }
6973
6974 std::cout << "Primitive UUIDs: " << std::endl;
6975 std::vector<uint> primitive_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ObjID);
6976 for(uint i=0; i<primitive_UUIDs.size();i++)
6977 {
6978 if(i < 5){
6979 PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(i));
6980 std::string pstype;
6981 if( ptype == 0){
6982 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
6983 }else if(ptype == 1){
6984 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
6985 }
6986 std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(i) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
6987 }else{
6988 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
6989 PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2));
6990 std::string pstype;
6991 if( ptype == 0){
6992 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
6993 }else if(ptype == 1){
6994 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
6995 }
6996 std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
6997 ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1));
6998 if( ptype == 0){
6999 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
7000 }else if(ptype == 1){
7001 pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
7002 }
7003 std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
7004 break;
7005 }
7006 }
7007
7008 if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TILE)
7009 {
7010 std::cout << "Tile Center: " << getTileObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
7011 std::cout << "Tile Size: " << getTileObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
7012 std::cout << "Tile Subdivision Count: " << getTileObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7013 std::cout << "Tile Normal: " << getTileObjectNormal(ObjID) << std::endl;
7014
7015 std::cout << "Tile Texture UV: " << std::endl;
7016 std::vector<vec2> uv = getTileObjectTextureUV(ObjID);
7017 for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
7018 {
7019 std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
7020 }
7021
7022 std::cout << "Tile Vertices: " << std::endl;
7023 std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getTileObjectVertices(ObjID);
7024 for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
7025 {
7026 std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
7027 }
7028
7029
7030 }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE){
7031
7032 std::cout << "Sphere Center: " << getSphereObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
7033 std::cout << "Sphere Radius: " << getSphereObjectRadius(ObjID) << std::endl;
7034 std::cout << "Sphere Subdivision Count: " << getSphereObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7035
7036 }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE){
7037
7038 std::cout << "Tube Subdivision Count: " << getTubeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7039 std::cout << "Tube Nodes: " << std::endl;
7040 std::vector<vec3> nodes = getTubeObjectNodes(ObjID);
7041 for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
7042 {
7043 if(i < 10){
7044 std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
7045 }else{
7046 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7047 std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-2) << std::endl;
7048 std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-1) << std::endl;
7049 break;
7050 }
7051 }
7052 std::cout << "Tube Node Radii: " << std::endl;
7053 std::vector<float> noderadii = getTubeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
7054 for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
7055 {
7056 if(i < 10){
7057 std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
7058 }else{
7059 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7060 std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-2) << std::endl;
7061 std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-1) << std::endl;
7062 break;
7063 }
7064 }
7065 std::cout << "Tube Node Colors: " << std::endl;
7066 std::vector<helios::RGBcolor> nodecolors = getTubeObjectNodeColors(ObjID);
7067 for(uint i=0; i<nodecolors.size();i++)
7068 {
7069 if(i < 10){
7070 std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(i) << std::endl;
7071 }else{
7072 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7073 std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-2) << std::endl;
7074 std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-1) << std::endl;
7075 break;
7076 }
7077 }
7078
7079 }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_BOX){
7080
7081 std::cout << "Box Center: " << getBoxObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
7082 std::cout << "Box Size: " << getBoxObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
7083 std::cout << "Box Subdivision Count: " << getBoxObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7084
7085 }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_DISK){
7086
7087 std::cout << "Disk Center: " << getDiskObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
7088 std::cout << "Disk Size: " << getDiskObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
7089 std::cout << "Disk Subdivision Count: " << getDiskObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7090
7091 // }else if(type == OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH){
7092 // nothing for now
7093
7094 }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_CONE){
7095
7096 std::cout << "Cone Length: " << getConeObjectLength(ObjID) << std::endl;
7097 std::cout << "Cone Axis Unit Vector: " << getConeObjectAxisUnitVector(ObjID) << std::endl;
7098 std::cout << "Cone Subdivision Count: " << getConeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
7099 std::cout << "Cone Nodes: " << std::endl;
7100 std::vector<vec3> nodes = getConeObjectNodes(ObjID);
7101 for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
7102 {
7103 std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
7104 }
7105 std::cout << "Cone Node Radii: " << std::endl;
7106 std::vector<float> noderadii = getConeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
7107 for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
7108 {
7109 std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
7110 }
7111 }
7112
7113
7114 float T[16];
7115 getObjectTransformationMatrix(ObjID, T);
7116 std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
7117 std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
7118 std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
7119 std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
7120 std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
7121
7122 std::cout << "Texture File: " << getObjectTextureFile(ObjID) << std::endl;
7123
7124 std::cout << "Object Data: " << std::endl;
7125 // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(ObjID);
7126 std::vector<std::string> pd = listObjectData(ObjID);
7127 for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
7128 {
7129 uint dsize = getObjectDataSize(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
7130 HeliosDataType dtype = getObjectDataType(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
7131 std::string dstype;
7132
7133 if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
7134 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
7135 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
7136 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
7137 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7138 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
7139 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
7140 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
7141 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
7142 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
7143 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
7144 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
7145 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
7146 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
7147 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
7148 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
7149 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
7150 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
7151 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
7152 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
7153 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
7154 dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
7155 }else{
7156 assert(false);
7157 }
7158
7159
7160 std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
7161
7162
7163 if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
7164 std::vector<int> pdata;
7165 getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7166 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7167 {
7168 if(j < 10){
7169 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7170 }else{
7171 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7172 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7173 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7174 break;
7175 }
7176
7177 }
7178 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
7179 std::vector<uint> pdata;
7180 getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7181 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7182 {
7183 if(j < 10){
7184 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7185 }else{
7186 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7187 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7188 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7189 break;
7190 }
7191
7192 }
7193 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7194 std::vector<float> pdata;
7195 getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7196 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7197 {
7198 if(j < 10){
7199 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7200 }else{
7201 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7202 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7203 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7204 break;
7205 }
7206
7207 }
7208 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
7209 std::vector<double> pdata;
7210 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7211 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7212 {
7213 if(j < 10){
7214 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7215 }else{
7216 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7217 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7218 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7219 break;
7220 }
7221
7222 }
7223 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
7224 std::vector<vec2> pdata;
7225 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7226 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7227 {
7228 if(j < 10){
7229 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7230 }else{
7231 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7232 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7233 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7234 break;
7235 }
7236
7237 }
7238 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
7239 std::vector<vec3> pdata;
7240 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7241 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7242 {
7243 if(j < 10){
7244 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7245 }else{
7246 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7247 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7248 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7249 break;
7250 }
7251
7252 }
7253 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
7254 std::vector<vec4> pdata;
7255 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7256 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7257 {
7258 if(j < 10){
7259 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7260 }else{
7261 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7262 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7263 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7264 break;
7265 }
7266
7267 }
7268 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
7269 std::vector<int2> pdata;
7270 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7271 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7272 {
7273 if(j < 10){
7274 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7275 }else{
7276 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7277 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7278 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7279 break;
7280 }
7281
7282 }
7283 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
7284 std::vector<int3> pdata;
7285 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7286 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7287 {
7288 if(j < 10){
7289 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7290 }else{
7291 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7292 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
7293 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
7294 break;
7295 }
7296
7297 }
7298 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
7299 std::vector<int4> pdata;
7300 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7301 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7302 {
7303 if(j < 10){
7304 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7305 }else{
7306 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7307 break;
7308 }
7309
7310 }
7311 }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
7312 std::vector<std::string> pdata;
7313 getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
7314 for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
7315 {
7316 if(j < 10){
7317 std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
7318 }else{
7319 std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
7320 break;
7321 }
7322
7323 }
7324 }else{
7325 assert(false);
7326 }
7327
7328 }
7329 std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
7330}
7331
7332CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer_private( uint ObjID ) const{
7333 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
7334 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
7335 }
7336 return objects.at(ObjID);
7337}
7338

7341 return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getArea();
7342}

7345 return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getPrimitiveCount();
7346}

7349 return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getObjectCenter();
7350}

7353 return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getTextureFile();
7354}

7361 getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
7362}

7364void Context::setObjectTransformationMatrix(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, float (&T)[16] ) {
7365 for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
7366 getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
7367 }
7368}

7417
7418void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( uint ObjID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const {
7419 std::vector<uint> ObjIDs{ObjID};
7420 getObjectBoundingBox(ObjIDs,min_corner,max_corner);
7421}
7422
7423void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
7424
7425 uint o=0;
7426 for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs ) {
7427
7428 if ( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end()){
7429 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getObjectBoundingBox): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
7430 }
7431
7432 const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs = objects.at(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
7433
7434 uint p=0;
7435 for (uint UUID: UUIDs) {
7436
7437 const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
7438
7439 if( p==0 && o==0 ){
7440 min_corner = vertices.front();
7441 max_corner = min_corner;
7442 p++;
7443 continue;
7444 }
7445
7446 for (const vec3 &vert: vertices) {
7447 if (vert.x < min_corner.x) {
7448 min_corner.x = vert.x;
7449 }
7450 if (vert.y < min_corner.y) {
7451 min_corner.y = vert.y;
7452 }
7453 if (vert.z < min_corner.z) {
7454 min_corner.z = vert.z;
7455 }
7456 if (vert.x > max_corner.x) {
7457 max_corner.x = vert.x;
7458 }
7459 if (vert.y > max_corner.y) {
7460 max_corner.y = vert.y;
7461 }
7462 if (vert.z > max_corner.z) {
7463 max_corner.z = vert.z;
7464 }
7465 }
7466 }
7467
7468 o++;
7469 }
7470
7471}
7472
7473Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
7474 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
7475 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
7476 }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
7477 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Tile Object.");
7478 }
7479 return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
7480}
7481
7482Sphere* Context::getSphereObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
7483 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
7484 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
7485 }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
7486 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Sphere Object.");
7487 }
7488 return dynamic_cast<Sphere*>(objects.at(ObjID));
7489}
7490
7491Tube* Context::getTubeObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
7492 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
7493 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTubeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");
7494 }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
7495 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getTubeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Tube Object.");
7496 }
7497 return dynamic_cast<Tube*>(objects.at(ObjID));
7498}

7500Box* Context::getBoxObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
7501 if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
7502 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getBoxObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context.");

7504 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::getBoxObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Box Object.");
7505 }

7507}

7639
7640void Context::duplicatePrimitiveData( const char* existing_data_label, const char* copy_data_label ){
7641
7642 for( auto primitive : primitives){
7643 if( primitive.second->doesPrimitiveDataExist(existing_data_label) ){
7644 HeliosDataType type = primitive.second->getPrimitiveDataType(existing_data_label);
7645 if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7646 std::vector<float> data;
7647 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7648 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7649 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ) {
7650 std::vector<double> data;
7651 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7652 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7653 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ) {
7654 std::vector<int> data;
7655 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7656 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7657 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ) {
7658 std::vector<uint> data;
7659 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7660 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7661 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ) {
7662 std::vector<vec2> data;
7663 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7664 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7665 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ) {
7666 std::vector<vec3> data;
7667 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7668 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7669 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ) {
7670 std::vector<vec4> data;
7671 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7672 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7673 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ) {
7674 std::vector<int2> data;
7675 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7676 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7677 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ) {
7678 std::vector<int3> data;
7679 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7680 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7681 }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
7682 std::vector<std::string> data;
7683 primitive.second->getPrimitiveData(existing_data_label, data);
7684 primitive.second->setPrimitiveData(copy_data_label, type, data.size(), &data.front());
7685 }
7686 }
7687 }
7688
7689
7690}
7691
7692void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, float &mean ) const{
7693 float value;
7694 float sum = 0.f;
7695 size_t count = 0;
7696 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7697
7698 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7699 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7700 sum += value;
7701 count++;
7702 }
7703
7704 }
7705
7706 if( count==0 ) {
7707 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7708 mean = 0;
7709 }else{
7710 mean = sum/float(count);
7711 }
7712
7713}
7714
7715void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, double &mean ) const{
7716 double value;
7717 double sum = 0.f;
7718 size_t count = 0;
7719 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7720
7721 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
7722 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7723 sum += value;
7724 count++;
7725 }
7726
7727 }
7728
7729 if( count==0 ) {
7730 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7731 mean = 0;
7732 }else{
7733 mean = sum/float(count);
7734 }
7735
7736}
7737
7738void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec2 &mean ) const{
7739 vec2 value;
7740 vec2 sum(0.f,0.f);
7741 size_t count = 0;
7742 for (uint UUID : UUIDs) {
7743
7744 if ( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, label.c_str()) == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ) {
7745 getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), value);
7746 sum = sum + value;
7747 count++;
7748 }
7749 }
7750
7751 if (count == 0) {
7752 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7753 mean = make_vec2(0,0);
7754 } else {
7755 mean = sum / float(count);
7756 }
7757}
7758
7759void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec3 &mean ) const{
7760 vec3 value;
7761 vec3 sum(0.f,0.f,0.f);
7762 size_t count = 0;
7763 for (uint UUID : UUIDs) {
7764
7765 if ( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, label.c_str()) == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ) {
7766 getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), value);
7767 sum = sum + value;
7768 count++;
7769 }
7770 }
7771
7772 if (count == 0) {
7773 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7774 mean = make_vec3(0,0,0);
7775 } else {
7776 mean = sum / float(count);
7777 }
7778}
7779
7780void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec4 &mean ) const{
7781 vec4 value;
7782 vec4 sum(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
7783 size_t count = 0;
7784 for (uint UUID : UUIDs) {
7785
7786 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, label.c_str()) == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ) {
7787 getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), value);
7788 sum = sum + value;
7789 count++;
7790 }
7791 }
7792
7793 if (count == 0) {
7794 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7795 mean = make_vec4(0,0,0,0);
7796 } else {
7797 mean = sum / float(count);
7798 }
7799}
7800
7801void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, float &awt_mean ) const{
7802 float value, A;
7803 float sum = 0.f;
7804 float area = 0;
7805 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7806
7807 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7808 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7809 A = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
7810 sum += value*A;
7811 area += A;
7812 }
7813
7814 }
7815
7816 if( area==0 ) {
7817 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7818 awt_mean = 0;
7819 }else{
7820 awt_mean = sum/area;
7821 }
7822}
7823
7824void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, double &awt_mean ) const{
7825 double value;
7826 float A;
7827 double sum = 0.f;
7828 double area = 0;
7829 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7830
7831 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
7832 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7833 A = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
7834 sum += value*double(A);
7835 area += A;
7836 }
7837
7838 }
7839
7840 if( area==0 ) {
7841 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7842 awt_mean = 0;
7843 }else{
7844 awt_mean = sum/area;
7845 }
7846}
7847
7848void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec2 &awt_mean ) const{
7849 vec2 value;
7850 float A;
7851 vec2 sum(0.f,0.f);
7852 float area = 0;
7853 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7854
7855 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
7856 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7857 A = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
7858 sum = sum + (value*A);
7859 area += A;
7860 }
7861
7862 }
7863
7864 if( area==0 ) {
7865 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7866 awt_mean = make_vec2(0,0);
7867 }else{
7868 awt_mean = sum/area;
7869 }
7870}
7871
7872void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec3 &awt_mean ) const{
7873 vec3 value;
7874 float A;
7875 vec3 sum(0.f,0.f,0.f);
7876 float area = 0;
7877 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7878
7879 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
7880 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7881 A = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
7882 sum = sum + (value*A);
7883 area += A;
7884 }
7885
7886 }
7887
7888 if( area==0 ) {
7889 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7890 awt_mean = make_vec3(0,0,0);
7891 }else{
7892 awt_mean = sum/area;
7893 }
7894}
7895
7896void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec4 &awt_mean ) const{
7897 vec4 value;
7898 float A;
7899 vec4 sum(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
7900 float area = 0;
7901 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7902
7903 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
7904 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7905 A = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
7906 sum = sum + (value*A);
7907 area += A;
7908 }
7909
7910 }
7911
7912 if( area==0 ) {
7913 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7914 awt_mean = make_vec4(0,0,0,0);
7915 }else{
7916 awt_mean = sum/area;
7917 }
7918}
7919
7920void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, float &sum ) const{
7921
7922 float value;
7923 sum = 0.f;
7924 bool added_to_sum = false;
7925 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7926
7927 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
7928 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7929 sum += value;
7930 added_to_sum = true;
7931 }
7932
7933 }
7934
7935 if( !added_to_sum ) {
7936 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7937 }
7938
7939}
7940
7941void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, double &sum ) const{
7942
7943 double value;
7944 sum = 0.f;
7945 bool added_to_sum = false;
7946 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7947
7948 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
7949 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7950 sum += value;
7951 added_to_sum = true;
7952 }
7953
7954 }
7955
7956 if( !added_to_sum ) {
7957 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7958 }
7959
7960}
7961
7962void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec2 &sum ) const{
7963
7964 vec2 value;
7965 sum = make_vec2(0.f,0.f);
7966 bool added_to_sum = false;
7967 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7968
7969 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
7970 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7971 sum = sum + value;
7972 added_to_sum = true;
7973 }
7974
7975 }
7976
7977 if( !added_to_sum ) {
7978 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
7979 }
7980
7981}

7984

7986 sum = make_vec3(0.f,0.f,0.f);

7988 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
7989
7990 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
7991 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
7992 sum = sum + value;
7993 added_to_sum = true;
7994 }
7995
7996 }
7997
7998 if( !added_to_sum ) {
7999 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8000 }
8001
8002}

8005
8006 vec4 value;
8007 sum = make_vec4(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
8008 bool added_to_sum = false;
8009 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8010
8011 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
8012 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8013 sum = sum + value;
8014 added_to_sum = true;
8015 }
8016
8017 }
8018
8019 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8020 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8021 }

8024
8025void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, float &awt_sum ) const{
8026
8027 float value;
8028 awt_sum = 0.f;
8029 bool added_to_sum = false;
8030 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8031
8032 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
8033 float area = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8034 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8035 awt_sum += value*area;
8036 added_to_sum = true;
8037 }
8038
8039 }
8040
8041 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8042 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8043 }
8044
8045}
8046
8047void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, double &awt_sum ) const{
8048
8049 double value;
8050 awt_sum = 0.f;
8051 bool added_to_sum = false;
8052 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8053
8054 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
8055 float area = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8056 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8057 awt_sum += value*area;
8058 added_to_sum = true;
8059 }
8060
8061 }
8062
8063 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8064 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8065 }
8066
8067}
8068
8069void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec2 &awt_sum ) const{
8070
8071 vec2 value;
8072 awt_sum = make_vec2(0.f,0.f);
8073 bool added_to_sum = false;
8074 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8075
8076 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
8077 float area = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8078 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8079 awt_sum = awt_sum + value*area;
8080 added_to_sum = true;
8081 }
8082
8083 }
8084
8085 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8086 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8087 }
8088
8089}
8090
8091void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec3 &awt_sum ) const{
8092
8093 vec3 value;
8094 awt_sum = make_vec3(0.f,0.f,0.f);
8095 bool added_to_sum = false;
8096 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8097
8098 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
8099 float area = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8100 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8101 awt_sum = awt_sum + value*area;
8102 added_to_sum = true;
8103 }
8104
8105 }
8106
8107 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8108 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8109 }
8110
8111}
8112
8113void Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, helios::vec4 &awt_sum ) const{
8114
8115 vec4 value;
8116 awt_sum = make_vec4(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.F);
8117 bool added_to_sum = false;
8118 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8119
8120 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) && doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
8121 float area = getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8122 getPrimitiveData(UUID,label.c_str(),value);
8123 awt_sum = awt_sum + value*area;
8124 added_to_sum = true;
8125 }
8126
8127 }
8128
8129 if( !added_to_sum ) {
8130 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum): No primitives found with primitive data of '" << label << "'. Returning a value of 0." << std::endl;
8131 }
8132
8133}
8134
8135void Context::scalePrimitiveData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &label, float scaling_factor ){
8136
8137 uint primitives_not_exist = 0;
8138 uint primitive_data_not_exist = 0;
8139 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8140 if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
8141 primitives_not_exist++;
8142 continue;
8143 }
8144 if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str()) ){
8145 primitive_data_not_exist++;
8146 continue;
8147 }
8148 HeliosDataType data_type = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,label.c_str());
8149 if( data_type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
8150 float data;
8151 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(),data);
8152 primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data*scaling_factor );
8153 }else if( data_type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
8154 double data;
8155 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(),data);
8156 primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data*scaling_factor );
8157 }else if( data_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
8158 vec2 data;
8159 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(),data);
8160 primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data*scaling_factor );
8161 }else if( data_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
8162 vec3 data;
8163 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(),data);
8164 primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data*scaling_factor );
8165 }else if( data_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
8166 vec4 data;
8167 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(),data);
8168 primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data*scaling_factor );
8169 }else{
8170 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::scalePrimitiveData): This operation only supports primitive data of type float, double, vec2, vec3, and vec4.");
8171 }
8172 }
8173
8174 if( primitives_not_exist>0 ){
8175 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::scalePrimitiveData): " << primitives_not_exist << " of " << UUIDs.size() << " from the input UUID vector did not exist." << std::endl;
8176 }
8177 if( primitive_data_not_exist>0 ){
8178 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::scalePrimitiveData): Primitive data did not exist for " << primitive_data_not_exist << " primitives, and thus no scaling was applied." << std::endl;
8179 }
8180
8181}
8182
8183void Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataSum( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::vector<std::string> &primitive_data_labels, const std::string &result_primitive_data_label ){
8184
8185 uint primitives_not_exist = 0;
8186 uint primitive_data_not_exist = 0;
8187
8188 float data_float = 0;
8189 double data_double = 0;
8190 uint data_uint = 0;
8191 int data_int = 0;
8192 int2 data_int2;
8193 int3 data_int3;
8194 int4 data_int4;
8195 vec2 data_vec2;
8196 vec3 data_vec3;
8197 vec4 data_vec4;
8198
8199 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8200 if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
8201 primitives_not_exist++;
8202 continue;
8203 }
8204
8205 HeliosDataType data_type;
8206
8207 bool init_type = false;
8208 for( const auto &label : primitive_data_labels ) {
8209
8210 if (!doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str())) {
8211 continue;
8212 }
8213
8214 HeliosDataType data_type_current = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, label.c_str());
8215 if( !init_type ) {
8216 data_type = data_type_current;
8217 init_type = true;
8218 }else{
8219 if( data_type!=data_type_current ){
8220 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataSum): Primitive data types are not consistent for UUID " + std::to_string(UUID));
8221 }
8222 }
8223
8224 if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
8225 float data;
8226 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8227 data_float += data;
8228 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
8229 double data;
8230 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8231 data_double += data;
8232 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
8233 vec2 data;
8234 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8235 data_vec2 = data_vec2 + data;
8236 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
8237 vec3 data;
8238 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8239 data_vec3 = data_vec3 + data;
8240 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
8241 vec4 data;
8242 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8243 data_vec4 = data_vec4 + data;
8244 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
8245 int data;
8246 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8247 data_int = data_int + data;
8248 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
8249 uint data;
8250 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8251 data_uint = data_uint + data;
8252 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
8253 int2 data;
8254 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8255 data_int2 = data_int2 + data;
8256 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
8257 int3 data;
8258 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8259 data_int3 = data_int3 + data;
8260 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
8261 int4 data;
8262 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8263 data_int4 = data_int4 + data;
8264 } else {
8265 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataSum): This operation is not supported for string primitive data types.");
8266 }
8267 }
8268
8269 if( !init_type ){
8270 primitive_data_not_exist++;
8271 continue;
8272 }else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
8273 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_float );
8274 data_float = 0;
8275 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
8276 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_double );
8277 data_double = 0;
8278 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
8279 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec2 );
8280 data_vec2 = make_vec2(0,0);
8281 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
8282 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec3 );
8283 data_vec3 = make_vec3(0,0,0);
8284 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
8285 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec4 );
8286 data_vec4 = make_vec4(0,0,0,0);
8287 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
8288 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int );
8289 data_int = 0;
8290 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
8291 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_uint );
8292 data_uint = 0;
8293 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
8294 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int2 );
8295 data_int2 = make_int2(0,0);
8296 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
8297 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int3 );
8298 data_int3 = make_int3(0,0,0);
8299 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
8300 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int4 );
8301 data_int4 = make_int4(0,0,0,0);
8302 }
8303
8304 }
8305
8306 if( primitives_not_exist>0 ){
8307 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataSum): " << primitives_not_exist << " of " << UUIDs.size() << " from the input UUID vector did not exist." << std::endl;
8308 }
8309 if( primitive_data_not_exist>0 ){
8310 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataSum): Primitive data did not exist for " << primitive_data_not_exist << " primitives, and thus no scaling summation was performed and new primitive data was not created for this primitive." << std::endl;
8311 }
8312
8313}
8314
8315void Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataProduct( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::vector<std::string> &primitive_data_labels, const std::string &result_primitive_data_label ){
8316
8317 uint primitives_not_exist = 0;
8318 uint primitive_data_not_exist = 0;
8319
8320 float data_float = 0;
8321 double data_double = 0;
8322 uint data_uint = 0;
8323 int data_int = 0;
8324 int2 data_int2;
8325 int3 data_int3;
8326 int4 data_int4;
8327 vec2 data_vec2;
8328 vec3 data_vec3;
8329 vec4 data_vec4;
8330
8331 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8332 if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
8333 primitives_not_exist++;
8334 continue;
8335 }
8336
8337 HeliosDataType data_type;
8338
8339 bool init_type = false;
8340 int i=0;
8341 for( const auto &label : primitive_data_labels ) {
8342
8343 if (!doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, label.c_str())) {
8344 continue;
8345 }
8346
8347 HeliosDataType data_type_current = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, label.c_str());
8348 if( !init_type ) {
8349 data_type = data_type_current;
8350 init_type = true;
8351 }else{
8352 if( data_type!=data_type_current ){
8353 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataProduct): Primitive data types are not consistent for UUID " + std::to_string(UUID));
8354 }
8355 }
8356
8357 if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
8358 float data;
8359 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8360 if( i==0 ){
8361 data_float = data;
8362 }else {
8363 data_float *= data;
8364 }
8365 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
8366 double data;
8367 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8368 if( i==0 ) {
8369 data_double *= data;
8370 }else{
8371 data_double = data;
8372 }
8373 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
8374 vec2 data;
8375 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8376 if( i==0 ){
8377 data_vec2.x *= data.x;
8378 data_vec2.y *= data.y;
8379 }else{
8380 data_vec2 = data;
8381 }
8382 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
8383 vec3 data;
8384 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8385 if( i==0 ){
8386 data_vec3.x *= data.x;
8387 data_vec3.y *= data.y;
8388 data_vec3.z *= data.z;
8389 }else{
8390 data_vec3 = data;
8391 }
8392 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
8393 vec4 data;
8394 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8395 if( i==0 ){
8396 data_vec4.x *= data.x;
8397 data_vec4.y *= data.y;
8398 data_vec4.z *= data.z;
8399 data_vec4.w *= data.w;
8400 }else{
8401 data_vec4 = data;
8402 }
8403 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
8404 int data;
8405 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8406 if( i==0 ){
8407 data_int = data_int * data;
8408 }else{
8409 data_int = data;
8410 }
8411 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
8412 uint data;
8413 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8414 if( i==0 ){
8415 data_uint = data_uint * data;
8416 }else{
8417 data_uint = data;
8418 }
8419 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
8420 int2 data;
8421 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8422 if( i==0 ){
8423 data_int2.x *= data.x;
8424 data_int2.y *= data.y;
8425 }else{
8426 data_int2 = data;
8427 }
8428 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
8429 int3 data;
8430 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8431 if( i==0 ){
8432 data_int3.x *= data.x;
8433 data_int3.y *= data.y;
8434 data_int3.z *= data.z;
8435 }else{
8436 data_int3 = data;
8437 }
8438 } else if ( data_type_current == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
8439 int4 data;
8440 primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
8441 if( i==0 ){
8442 data_int4.x *= data.x;
8443 data_int4.y *= data.y;
8444 data_int4.z *= data.z;
8445 data_int4.w *= data.w;
8446 }else{
8447 data_int4 = data;
8448 }
8449 } else {
8450 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataProduct): This operation is not supported for string primitive data types.");
8451 }
8452 i++;
8453 }
8454
8455 if( !init_type ){
8456 primitive_data_not_exist++;
8457 continue;
8458 }else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
8459 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_float );
8460 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
8461 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_double );
8462 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
8463 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec2 );
8464 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
8465 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec3 );
8466 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
8467 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_vec4 );
8468 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
8469 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int );
8470 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
8471 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_uint );
8472 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
8473 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int2 );
8474 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
8475 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int3 );
8476 } else if ( data_type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
8477 setPrimitiveData( UUID, result_primitive_data_label.c_str(), data_int4 );
8478 }
8479
8480 }
8481
8482 if( primitives_not_exist>0 ){
8483 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataProduct): " << primitives_not_exist << " of " << UUIDs.size() << " from the input UUID vector did not exist." << std::endl;
8484 }
8485 if( primitive_data_not_exist>0 ){
8486 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::aggregatePrimitiveDataProduct): Primitive data did not exist for " << primitive_data_not_exist << " primitives, and thus no multiplication was performed and new primitive data was not created for this primitive." << std::endl;
8487 }
8488
8489}
8490
8491
8492float Context::sumPrimitiveSurfaceArea( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ) const{
8493
8494 bool primitive_warning = false;
8495 float area = 0;
8496 for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
8497
8498 if( doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
8499 area += getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
8500 }else{
8501 primitive_warning = true;
8502 }
8503
8504 }
8505
8506 if( primitive_warning ){
8507 std::cout << "WARNING (Context::sumPrimitiveSurfaceArea): One or more primitives reference in the UUID vector did not exist.";
8508 }
8509
8510 return area;
8511
8512}
8513
8514std::vector<uint> Context::filterPrimitivesByData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data_label, float filter_value, const std::string &comparator ){
8515
8516 if( comparator!="==" && comparator!=">" && comparator!="<" && comparator!=">=" && comparator!="<=" ){
8517 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::filterPrimitivesByData): Invalid comparator. Must be one of '==', '>', '<', '>=', or '<='.");
8518 }
8519
8520 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_out = UUIDs;
8521 for( int p=UUIDs.size()-1; p>=0; p-- ){
8522 uint UUID = UUIDs_out.at(p);
8523 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
8524 float data;
8525 getPrimitiveData(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str(),data);
8526 if( comparator=="==" && data==filter_value ){
8527 continue;
8528 }else if ( comparator==">" && data>filter_value ) {
8529 continue;
8530 }else if ( comparator=="<" && data<filter_value ){
8531 continue;
8532 }else if ( comparator==">=" && data>=filter_value ){
8533 continue;
8534 }else if ( comparator=="<=" && data<=filter_value ){
8535 continue;
8536 }
8537
8538 std::swap( UUIDs_out.at(p),UUIDs_out.back() );
8539 UUIDs_out.pop_back();
8540 }
8541 }
8542
8543 return UUIDs_out;
8544
8545}
8546
8547std::vector<uint> Context::filterPrimitivesByData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data_label, double filter_value, const std::string &comparator ){
8548
8549 if( comparator!="==" && comparator!=">" && comparator!="<" && comparator!=">=" && comparator!="<=" ){
8550 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::filterPrimitivesByData): Invalid comparator. Must be one of '==', '>', '<', '>=', or '<='.");
8551 }
8552
8553 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_out = UUIDs;
8554 for( int p=UUIDs.size()-1; p>=0; p-- ){
8555 uint UUID = UUIDs_out.at(p);
8556 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
8557 double data;
8558 getPrimitiveData(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str(),data);
8559 if( comparator=="==" && data==filter_value ){
8560 continue;
8561 }else if ( comparator==">" && data>filter_value ) {
8562 continue;
8563 }else if ( comparator=="<" && data<filter_value ){
8564 continue;
8565 }else if ( comparator==">=" && data>=filter_value ){
8566 continue;
8567 }else if ( comparator=="<=" && data<=filter_value ){
8568 continue;
8569 }
8570
8571 std::swap( UUIDs_out.at(p),UUIDs_out.back() );
8572 UUIDs_out.pop_back();
8573 }
8574 }
8575
8576 return UUIDs_out;
8577
8578}
8579
8580std::vector<uint> Context::filterPrimitivesByData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data_label, int filter_value, const std::string &comparator ){
8581
8582 if( comparator!="==" && comparator!=">" && comparator!="<" && comparator!=">=" && comparator!="<=" ){
8583 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::filterPrimitivesByData): Invalid comparator. Must be one of '==', '>', '<', '>=', or '<='.");
8584 }
8585
8586 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_out = UUIDs;
8587 for( int p=UUIDs.size()-1; p>=0; p-- ){
8588 uint UUID = UUIDs_out.at(p);
8589 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
8590 int data;
8591 getPrimitiveData(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str(),data);
8592 if( comparator=="==" && data==filter_value ){
8593 continue;
8594 }else if ( comparator==">" && data>filter_value ) {
8595 continue;
8596 }else if ( comparator=="<" && data<filter_value ){
8597 continue;
8598 }else if ( comparator==">=" && data>=filter_value ){
8599 continue;
8600 }else if ( comparator=="<=" && data<=filter_value ){
8601 continue;
8602 }
8603
8604 std::swap( UUIDs_out.at(p),UUIDs_out.back() );
8605 UUIDs_out.pop_back();
8606 }
8607 }
8608
8609 return UUIDs_out;
8610
8611}
8612
8613std::vector<uint> Context::filterPrimitivesByData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data_label, uint filter_value, const std::string &comparator ){
8614
8615 if( comparator!="==" && comparator!=">" && comparator!="<" && comparator!=">=" && comparator!="<=" ){
8616 helios_runtime_error("ERROR (Context::filterPrimitivesByData): Invalid comparator. Must be one of '==', '>', '<', '>=', or '<='.");
8617 }
8618
8619 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_out = UUIDs;
8620 for( int p=UUIDs.size()-1; p>=0; p-- ){
8621 uint UUID = UUIDs_out.at(p);
8622 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
8623 uint data;
8624 getPrimitiveData(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str(),data);
8625 if( comparator=="==" && data==filter_value ){
8626 continue;
8627 }else if ( comparator==">" && data>filter_value ) {
8628 continue;
8629 }else if ( comparator=="<" && data<filter_value ){
8630 continue;
8631 }else if ( comparator==">=" && data>=filter_value ){
8632 continue;
8633 }else if ( comparator=="<=" && data<=filter_value ){
8634 continue;
8635 }
8636
8637 std::swap( UUIDs_out.at(p),UUIDs_out.back() );
8638 UUIDs_out.pop_back();
8639 }
8640 }
8641
8642 return UUIDs_out;
8643
8644}
8645
8646std::vector<uint> Context::filterPrimitivesByData( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const std::string &primitive_data_label, const std::string &filter_value ){
8647
8648 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_out = UUIDs;
8649 for( int p=UUIDs.size()-1; p>=0; p-- ){
8650 uint UUID = UUIDs_out.at(p);
8651 if( doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str()) && getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str())==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
8652 std::string data;
8653 getPrimitiveData(UUID,primitive_data_label.c_str(),data);
8654 if( data!=filter_value ) {
8655 std::swap(UUIDs_out.at(p), UUIDs_out.back());
8656 UUIDs_out.pop_back();
8657 }
8658 }
8659 }
8660
8661 return UUIDs_out;
8662
8663}

void scale(const helios::vec3 &scale)
